49a1(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /de 'di gtong ba chen po rna ba can/ de 'di 'jig pa stobs ni chen po'o/ /zhes pa ste rkang pa'i dang po rnams su/ sai Shar zhes byung ba lta bu'o/ /i ti pA Ni ni bya ka ra Na sya sand+he(mdo 'grel): sU tA ta pany+tsa sand+ha ya(mdo 'grel): sa mA d+hA(mdo 'grel): zhes pa pA
49a2(mdo 'grel): Ni ni byA ka ra Na'i mtshams sbyor gyi mdo las mtshams sbyor lnga pa rdzogs so// //de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po pA Ni ni byA ka ra Na gzhung 'grel gyi go don cho ga dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod pa
49a3(mdo 'grel): legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta zhes bya ba las mtshams sbyor lnga pa'i cho ga spyir btad dmigs bsal dang bcas pa rags pa rnams re zhig rdzogs so// //bla ma dang 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag
49a4(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /de ltar mtshams sbyor gyi cho ga rnams bshad zin nas da ni ming las tshig tu bsgrub pa pa su la sogs pa'i rab tu bya ba rnams 'chad par bya ste/ artha ba da d+hA tu ra pra tya ya(mdo 'grel): prA ti pa di kaM/ byings min pa rkyen med pa don dang
49a5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa ming ngo/ /byings ma yin pa ste byings la kri ta sogs kyi rkyen sbyin pas 'gyur grub pa/ su sogs dang ti sogs kyi rnam dbyi'i rkyen med pa'i don dang ldan pa ni/ rtags sam/ ming dam/ sgra 'am/ pra ti pa di ka zhes bya ste/ su
49a6(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa rnams 'jug pa'i yul lo/ /pra dya ya(mdo 'grel): pa ra shtsa/ rkyen pha rol la'ang ngo/ /su ba la sogs pa'i rkyen rnams ming gi pha rol tu sbyin par bya'o/ /su la sogs pa ni 'di rnams te/ su aau dzas/ am aauT shas/ TA b+hyaM
49a7(mdo 'grel): b+his/ de bd+hAM b+hyas/ nga si b+hya ma b+hyas/ ngas os AM/ ngi os su pa/ rnam dbye 'di rnams kyi dang po'i gcig tshig gi u dang/ mang tshig dzas kyi ja/ gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig gi Ta/ mang tshig gi sha/ gsum pa'i gcig tshig gi Ta/ bzhi bo
49b1(mdo 'grel): lnga pa/ drug pa/ bdun pa rnams kyi nga rnams dang/ lnga pa'i nga si'i i/ bdun pa'i mang tshig gi pa rnams don dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i mang can no/ /bi b+ha k+ti shtsa/ rnam dbye'o/ /gong du bshad pa'i su la sogs pa rnams dang/ 'og nas 'byung ba'i ti la
49b2(mdo 'grel): segs pa rnams la rnam dbye zhes bya'o/ /su la sogs pa nyer gcig po 'di rnams kyi 'ang/ su aau dzas dang po don cam brjod pa/ a ma aau da shas gnyis pa las kyi don/ TA b+hya ma b+his gsum pa byed pa po/ /de b+hya ma b+hyas bzhi pa ched
49b3(mdo 'grel): du bya ba/ nga si b+hya ma b+hyas lnga pa byung khung/ ngas os A ma drug pa 'brel pa/ di sos sub bdun pa gnas gzhi rnams la 'jug go /de rnams lad dper na dang po'i gcig tshig su dang/ gnyis tshig aau/ mang mig jas lta bu thams
49b4(mdo 'grel): cang la gcig tshig gnyis tshig mang tshig ste gsum gsum du gnas so/ /su pa(mdo 'grel): su pa'o/ /su pa zhes smos pas so sor bsdu ba'i brda ste dang po'i gcig tshigs su la bdun pa'i mang tshig gi pa sbyar bas su nas pa'i bar gyi rnam dbye
49b5(mdo 'grel): dun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig po thams cad go par byed do/ /dwe ka yo rdwi ba tsa nai ka ba tsa ne/ e ka dwi dag gi gcig tshig gnyis tshig dag go /gcig gi skad dod e ka la rnam dbye rnams kyi gcig tshig kho na dang/ gnyis kyi skad dod dwi la
49b6(mdo 'grel): gnyis tshig kho na 'jug go /ba hu Shu ba hu ba ce ni/ ba hu la mang tshig go/ mang po'i sgra ba hu zhes pa lta bu la mang tshig kho na 'jug go /~ da ni rtags dang rnam dbye sbyor ba'i cho ga rnams ston par bya ste/ rtags de yang pha rtags mo rtags
49b7(mdo 'grel): ma ning gi rtags dang gsum pu yod la/ rtags gsum po de la'ang a ce'i mdza' can dang hal gyi mdza' can gnyis su gnas pa las/ dang po a tsa'i mdza' can pha rtogs a thung mdza' can las/ rA ma zhes pa'i rtags sam ming la
50a1(mdo 'grel): dper brjod du bya ste/ rA ma la su/ de dbyi 'os u phyis/ sa sa dzul sogs kyi mngos sa ra/ khar sogs kyi mdos ra rnam bcad byas pas/ rA ma(mdo 'grel): dga' byed/ rA ma la gnyis tshig /aau pra tha ma yo(mdo 'grel): bU rbas?
50a2(mdo 'grel): ba r+Na(mdo 'grel): dang po dag la snga ma 'dra ba'o/ /ming a ka so sor bsdu ba'i mdza' can gyi pha rol tu rnam dbye dang po dang gnyis dag gi a tsa dang po can rnams byung na/ de'i snga ma rtags mdza' i a tsa de dang 'dra ba'i ring por 'gyur
50a3(mdo 'grel): bas skabs 'dir yang a ring por bsgyur ba thob kyang de'i dmigs bsal/ nA di tsi/ a ta i tsa la ma yin no/ /a ka gi nang tshan yin kyang rtags mdza' a yig la pha rol i tsa snga ma 'dra ba'i ring por mi 'gyur bas
50a4(mdo 'grel): a ring por mi bsgyur/ e tsa la 'phel ba 'os gnyis dag gis gcig 'phel bar bsgyur bas/ rA mau/ dga' byed dag /rA ma la mang tshig dzas/ tsU TU/ tsu Tu dag go /rkyen gyi thog ma'i cu ste tsa sde dang Tu ste Ta sde rnams 'gro ba'i ming can te
50a5(mdo 'grel): dza phyis/ na bi b+ha k+tau tu smA(mdo 'grel): rnam dbye'i tu sra mra rnams ma yin no/ /rnam dbye'i ta sde dang/ shas lta bu'i sa dang/ a ma lta bu'i ma rnams ni 'gro ba'i mid can ma yin no/ /dang po dag la snga ma 'dra ba 'os ring po/ /sa sa dzu Sha sogs
50a6(mdo 'grel): kyis sa ra/ khar sogs kyis rnam bcad byas pas/ rA mA(mdo 'grel): dga' byed rnams/ e ka batsa ne saM bu d+d+hi(mdo 'grel): gcig tshig la saM bud+d+hi'o/ /bod ba'i don du sbyin pa'i rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig la saM bu d+d+hi zhes ming 'dogs byed do/ /rA ma la
50a7(mdo 'grel): bod pa'i don gyi su/ eng h+ra swAtshaM bud+d+he(mdo 'grel): thung du dang eng las saM bu d+d+hi'o/ /a tsa thung du rnams dang/ eng so sor bsdu ba'i mdza' can las pha rol gyi sa bud+d+hi dbyi bar bya ste/ saM bud+d+hi phyis/ bod tshig rnam dbye byin pa'i rtags su te sngon
50b1(mdo 'grel): du bzhag pas/ he rA ma/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gong gi rnam dbye dang po'i skabs ltar bsgrub pas/ te rA mau/ he rA mA(mdo 'grel): rA ma la rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig aM/ a mi pU rba(mdo 'grel): am la snga ma'o/ /rtags mdza' a ka so sor bar bu bo?
50b2(mdo 'grel): yi ge yin na rnam kyi dga' byed/ dbye gnyis pa'i am gyi e yog snga ma'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ rA maM/ kye dga' byed dag /kyai dga' byed rnams/ gnyis tshig dang po'i gnyis tshig ltar bsgrubs pas/ rA mau/ dga' byed dag la/ rA ma la mang tshig shas/ pha sha kwa
50b3(mdo 'grel): ha d+d+hi te/ de phan ma yin pa la la sha ku rnams so/ /de phan gyi rkyen ma yin pa'i rnam dbye dang/ byings dag 'byed la/ sgrub dang/ kri ta sogs gang la'ang rkyen gyi thog mar gnas pa'i la yig dang/ sha yig dang ku ste ka sde rnams 'gro ba'i mang can te/
50b4(mdo 'grel): sha phyis/ dang po dag la snga ma 'dra 'os ring por bsgyur/ ta smA ts+tsha so na(mdo 'grel): puM si/ de las shas kyi na skyes pa la'o/ /skyes pa'i rtags 'dra ba'i cho ga byas zin pa'i pha rol gyi shas kyi sa yig ni na yig tu 'gyur te/ sa nar bsgyur bas/ rA mA na/
50b5(mdo 'grel): paShA b+hyaM no Na sa mA na pa de/ ra Sha dag las na'i Na rkang pa mtshugs pa la'o/ /rkang pa mtshungs pa ste tshig rkang gcig tu gnas pa'i ra yig dang Sha yig dag las pha rol gyi na yig ni Nar 'gyur ro/ /aT ku pwAng nu m+bya bA ye nya pi/ dga' byed rnams laM/?
50b6(mdo 'grel): atra ku pu A ba num rnams bar na yod kyang ngo/ /tshu rol ra yig dang la yig dag las pha rol gyi na yig ni aT so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge rnams dang/ ka sde dang/ pa sde dang/ nyer bsgyur Ang dang num A ga ma rnams bar na yod kyang Nar
50b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bas/ sbyir btang na Nar 'gyur ba thob kyang de'i yang dmigs bsal ni/ /na pa dA n+ta sya/ tshig mdza' i ma yin no/ /rgyu mtshan gong du smos pa de rnams tshang yang tshig mdza' i na srog med ni Nar mi 'gyur bas na nyid du gnas so/ /rA ma la dra? blun?
51a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i gcig tshig TA sbyin/ yasmAta pratya ya bi d+hi sta dA di pra tya yAng+ga/ gang rkyen gyi cho ga rkyen ni de'i snga ma la ang+ga'o/ /gang rkyen gyi gzhi'am sya mA ste rtags de na pha rol rkyen gyi cho ga 'byung ba'i phyir ang+ga'i
51a2(mdo 'grel): ming can zhes brda chang byed do/ /TA/ nga si da sI ma nAtya(mdo 'grel): TA da si das rnams kyi i na ata sya rnams so/ /rtags a yigs mdza' i can ang+ga zhes brda chang byas pa de'i pha rol rnam dbye gsum pa'i gcig chig TA ni a ni dang/ snga
51a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i gcig tshig nga si ni ata/ drug pa'i gcig tshig nga sa ni sya rnams su 'gyur te/ TA/ a ni/ a las yon tan no sa e/ re Sha dag la zhes pa'i mdos/ na Na/ rA me Na/ rA ma la/ gsum pa'i b+hyaM/ su pi tsa/ sub la'ang ngo/ /
51a4(mdo 'grel): rtags/ a thur mdza' ang+ga'i ming can las/ sub la sogs pa'i rnam dbye yanya so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge byung na rtags mdza' ring por 'gyur ro/ /rA mA b+hyaM/ rA ma la/ dga' byed kyis/ gsum pa'i/ b+his/ a to d+hi sa is/ ata las
51a5(mdo 'grel): b+ha sa'i aM sa'o/ /rtags a thung mdza' ang+ga'i ming can las/ rnam dbye gsum pa'i mang tshig b+his ni is ru bsgyur ro/ /e ce las 'phel ba dang/ dga' byed dag gis/ sa sa dzu Sha sogs kyis/ rA mai(mdo 'grel): rA ma la /bzhi pa'i de
51a6(mdo 'grel): nga(mdo 'grel): ya(mdo 'grel): de ya'o/ /rtags a thung mdza' can ang+ga'i ming can las pha rol gyi de ni ya ru 'gyur te/ de ya ru bsgyur/ su pa la'ang dos ring po/ rA mA ya/ rA ma la bzhi pa'i b+hyAM /sub la'ang ngos/ dpa' byed rnams kyis/ rA mA b+hyAM/ rA ma la
51a7(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa'i mang tshig phya ba/ btub ca ne dzha lyeta/ mang tshig la dzha la la eta'o/ /rtags mdza' a thung ang+ga'i ming can las/ rnam dbye mang tshig dzha la dga' byed gyi ched du/ gyi yi ge dang po can gang byung yang/ rtags dga' phyid dag gi ched du/
51b1(mdo 'grel): mdza' e yig tu 'gyur te rA me b+hya(mdo 'grel): eta/ zhes bshad pa ni ta yig de'i dus kyi'o/ /zhes pa'i don no/ /rA ma la/ lnga ba'i da si/ TA da si ngas rnams kyi i na ata sya rnams so zhes pas/ nga si ata/ aka 'dra ba sogs kyis/ rA mAta/ rA ma la
51b2(mdo 'grel): lnga ba'i b+hyaM dang b+hyas/ gong gi bzhi dga' byed rnams kyi ched du/ /ba'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ rA mA b+hyAM/ rA me b+hya(mdo 'grel): rA ma la/ drug pa'i das/ TA da si sogs kyi mngos/ rA ma sya/ rA ma la/ gnyis tshig aaus/ o si tsa/ os la'ang do dga' byed las/ rnams
51b3(mdo 'grel): dbye os pha rol la rtags ang+ga'i ming can de e ru 'gyur ro/ /a tsa'i a ya sogs dga' byed dag las/ dga' byed rnams las/ dang/ sa sa dzuSha sogs kyi mdos/ rA ma dga' byed kyi/ yo(mdo 'grel): rA ma la/ drug pa'i Ama/ h+ra swa na dyA/ po nuTa/ thung ngu na dI a ba
51b4(mdo 'grel): rnams?? las nu Ta'o/ /rtags mdza' thung ngu rnams dang na dI ming can te bud med kyi rtags a'i a'u gnyis dang A ba ste mo rtags A ring mdza' can rnams las dga' byed dag gi/ pha rol rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig A ma la nu Ta A ga ma ster te/ Ti yig
51b5(mdo 'grel): TI pa sogs kyi don u brjod don/ rA ma/ nAma/ nA mi/ nAma la'o/ /nA ma pha rol la rtags mdza' i a tsa gang yin kyang ring por 'gyur te/ rtags mdza' ring po ata ku bu sogs kyi mngos/ nANA/ rA ma NI/ rA ma la/ bdun pa'i di/ nga 'gro ba'i
51b6(mdo 'grel): don?? can yin pas phyis a la yon tan nos/ /rA ma khas dbyangs/ rA ma la/ 'dun pa'i os/ gong drug pa'i skabs ltar bsgrub pas/ rA ma yo(mdo 'grel): rA ma la bdun pa'i mang tshig sub pa so sor bsdu ba'i don yin dga' byed rnams kyi/ pas phyis/ mang tshig
51b7(mdo 'grel): la dzha la la/ e ta'os/ rA ma su/ u de sha pra dya ya yo(mdo 'grel): kun nas bsgyur ba dang rkyen dag la'o/ /tshul iN so sor bsdu ba'i yi dag 'byed pa gal/ ge dang ka sde yod la/ phar laSha sar bsnyar? pa ni ba lta bu kun nas bsgyur ba dang/ rkyen gyis tshig
52a1(mdo 'grel): mdza' min pa rnams Sha ru 'gyur te/ rA me Shu/ tshig mdza' yin na mi 'gyur te/ ha rista tra/ zhes ba lta bu la tshu rol iN so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge i mthong yang pha rol sa Shar mi 'gyur bar sa nyid du gnas pa lta bu'o
52a2(mdo 'grel): de ltar a tsa mdza' can skyes ba'i rtags las spyir btang/ dga' byed rnam pa la/ a thung mdza' can gyi cho ga rnams 'phrog byed de la/ bshad zin nas a thung mdza' can las dmigs bsal sarba la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams bshad par bya ste/ sarbA dI ni
52a3(mdo 'grel): sarba nA mA ni/ sarba la sogs pa rnams la sarba'i ming can no/ /sarba la sogs pa ni 'di rnams te/ sarba/ bi shwa/ u b+ha/ u b+ha ya/ Da ta ra/ Da ta ma/ i ta ra/ a n+ya/ a n+ya ta ra/ twa ta/ dwa ne ma/ sa ma/ si ma/ pU wa/ ba ra/ bzhi
52a4(mdo 'grel): ya wa ra/ dak+Sha Na/ ut+ta ra/ a pa ra/ a d+ha ra/ swa/ an+ta ra/ tyada/ tada/ yang/ a tad/ thams cad sna tshogs/ gnyis/ i dam/ a das/ ra'am tha da/ gzhan/ gzhan dang gzhan/ e ka/ dwi/ khyod/ zer/ khrims mnyam pa/ shar ra'am mdun nam sngon/
52a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan /lho/ byang/ gzhan shar/ dma' ba dang mtshu/ mtho rim/ bar mtshams/ de/ yuSh+mad/ gang/ de/ asmad/ b+ha wa ta/ ki ma rnams so/ /'di/ Da ta ra dang 'di/ Da ta ra gnyis ni ming min yang gcig gnyis/ rkyen de gnyis gang la sbyar ba'i ming de yang sarba'i
52a6(mdo 'grel): ming can du shes par bya'o/ /'di rnams ni rtags gsum cho ga thams cad 'jug khyed/ rung yin no/ /sarba yod/ ci la rnam dbye dang po'i su dang aau gnyis gong sbyar btang a thung mdza' can rU ma'i skabs ltar bsgrubs pas/ sarba(mdo 'grel): sarbau/
52a7(mdo 'grel): sarba la/ dzas/ dza sa(mdo 'grel): shI/ dzas kyi shI'o/ /a thung mthA can sarba'i rtags la rnam dbye dang de'i mang tshig dzas ni shI ru 'gyur te/ sha 'gro ba'i ming can yin pas phyis/ a las zhes pa'i mngos sa rbe/ rnams dbye gnyis pa rnams gong rA ma'i
52b1(mdo 'grel): skabs ltar/ sarbbaM/ sarbbo/ sarbban/ rnam dbye gsum pa rnams kyang gong bzhin/ sarboN/ sarbA b+hyaM sarbbe(mdo 'grel): sarba la bzhi pa'i de/ sarba nAmman(mdo 'grel): smai/ sarba'i ming can las sme'o/ /a thung mtjha' can sarba'i ming can te sarba sogs la rnam dbye bzhi ba'i de ni smed
52b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /sarba sme/ sarba la bzhi pa'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig gnyis/ gong rA ma'i skabs ltar/ sarbA bbyaM/ sarbe b+hya(mdo 'grel): sarba la lnga ba'i da si/ nga si dro(mdo 'grel): smAdsmanau/ nga si di dag gi smad smin dag go /sarba sogs pa rnam dbye lnga pa'i gcig tshig pa
52b3(mdo 'grel): si na smAta dang/ bdun pa'i gcig tshig di ni smin du 'gyur ro/ /sarba smAta/ sarbA b+hyaM/ sarbe b+hya(mdo 'grel): sarba drug pa'i ngas dang os gnyis gong rA ma'i skabs ltar/ sarba sya/ sarba yo(mdo 'grel): sarba la/ rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig Ama/ A i sarba
52b4(mdo 'grel): nAn+na(mdo 'grel): suTu/ A ma la sarba'i ming can rnams las suTa'o/ /a thung mdza' can sarba sogs la rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig a ma la suTa Agan 'jug go /sarba sAM/ mang tshig la/ zhes dang/ kun nas bsgyur ba sogs kyi mdos/ sarba ShA/
52b5(mdo 'grel): sarba la/ di/ ngas/ di dag gi zhes pa'i mngos/ sarba smin/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig spyir btang dang 'dra bas/ sarba yo(mdo 'grel): sarbe Shu/ kun tu bod pa'i don can rnams te sarba/ he sarbau/ he sarbe/ zhes pa ltar bi shwa sogs sarba'i ming can a thung mdza' 
52b6(mdo 'grel): can rnams la chog 'di kho na bzhin bgrub pa nyo/ /sarba'i mang can gyi nang tshan/ u b+ha la ni/ su sogs gcig tshig bdun dang jas sogs mang tshig bdun mi 'jug /gnyis tshig bdun po kho na 'jug pas/ rnam dbye dang po la/ u b+hau/
52b7(mdo 'grel): gnyis ny+tsa'a? u b+hau/ gsum pa la/ a'u b+hA b+hyi/ bzhi pa la/ a'u b+hA b+hyI/ lnga pa la/ u b+hA b+hyA/ drug pa la/ a'u b+hya yo(mdo 'grel): bdun pa la(mdo 'grel): u b+ha yo(mdo 'grel): bdun pa la(mdo 'grel): u b+ha yo(mdo 'grel): de rnams rnam dbye rnams kyi gnyis tshig kho nas grub pa'o/ /sarba'i ming can gyi nang tshan/ pU rba sogs
53a1(mdo 'grel): la/ rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig gong ltar/ pUrba(mdo 'grel): pUrbau/ mang tshig dzas kyi skabs yang na/ ba ste/ pUrba la dzes/ pUrba pa rA wa ra dak+Shi Not+ta rA pa rA dra rA Ni bya was+tha yA ma saM dz+nya yAM/ pUrba/ pa ra/ a wa ra
53a2(mdo 'grel): na k+Shita/ ut+tara. a ba ra/ a dta ra rnams rnam par bzhag pa ste ming ma yin pa la'o/ /sarbI nad tshan/ pUrba sogs te pUrba nas/ a d+ha ra'i bar rnams la rnam par bzhag pa ste ming ma yin na sarba nA ma'i tsha ga dang/ ming yin na sbyir
53a3(mdo 'grel): btang a thud mdza' can rA na'i cho ga ltar bsgrub pa'o/ /pUrbA(mdo 'grel): de bzhin spa'i sgra la dzas/ sba ma dnyA ti d+ha nA khyA yaM/ sba la gnyan dang nor dag la ma yin no/ /sarba'i nang tshan sba la gnyen dang nor dag dang sbyor ba'i tshe sarba'i mid can
53a4(mdo 'grel): ma yin te/ sarba sogs kyi cho ga ltar jas shIr mi 'gyur bar sbyir btang a thung mdza' can kho na'i cho gas ba sbrubs pa'o/ /sbA:dz+nyA ta ya(mdo 'grel): an+ta ra la dzas/ an+ta ra ba hiryyo go pa saM bya na yo(mdo 'grel): an+ta ra la phyi dang sbyor ba gan pa dag las
53a5(mdo 'grel): so/ /sarba'i ming can an+ta ra'i sgra la/ phyi dang sbyor ba dang gos gyon pa'i sgra sbyor ba'i tshe/ sarba nA ma'i bya ba mi 'jug par/ rA ma'i cho ga nis mtho ris zhes pa/ bsgrubs pas/ an+ta rA dang/ phyi dang go ni pa'i don ma yin na sarba'i ming can ltar bsgrubs
53a6(mdo 'grel): pas/ an+ya re/ thu? rwA di b+ho na wa b+hyo bA/ pUrba sogs dgu las yang na'o/ /pUrba la sogs pa dgu las/ rnam dbye lnga pa'i gcig tshig da si dang/ bdun pa'i gcig tshig di gnyis ni yang na ba ste/ sbyir btang a thung mdza' can rA ma'i cho ga
53a7(mdo 'grel): dang sarba nA ma'i chog gang rung 'jug pas/ lnga pa la/ pUrbAta/ pUrbasmAta/ bdun pa la/ pUrbe/ pUrba smin lta bu'o/ /de bzhin du pa rAta par smA ti/ lnga pa re/ pa ra smin/ dun pa ste/ de ltar pUrba nas/ an+ta ra'i bar thams cad rigs 'gra'o/ /sarba'i
53b1(mdo 'grel): ming can rnams la nyer bsgyur sbyor ba dang/ ming dang/ sam la mnyam pa'i don/ swa la nor dang gnyen gyi don/ an+ta ra la phyi'i don rnams sbyor ba la sarba'i ming can ma yin te/ sarba nA ma'i cho ga rnams mi 'jug par sbyir btang a thung can gyi
53b2(mdo 'grel): skabs su bshad pa ltar bya'o/ /de yang dper na/ de yang dper na/ a ti sarbA(mdo 'grel): zhes nyer bsgyur a ti yod pa'i sarba la dzas shIr mi 'gyur bar rA ma ltar bsgrubs pa lta bu'o/ /na ba hu brI ho/ /'bru mang po la ma yin no/ /sarba sogs la 'bru mang po'i
53b3(mdo 'grel): tshig sdud gnas pa la yang sarba nA ma'i cho ga rnams shin tu thams cad rnams/ mi 'jug ste/ dper na/ pri ya sarba la/ de byin pa/ smai ru mi 'gyur bar/ de yar bsgyur bas/ pri ya sarbA ya/ tri tI yA sa mA se/ gsum pa'i tshig sdud la'o/ /
53b4(mdo 'grel): gsum pa'i tshig sdud ces pa de'i skyes bu'i bsdu ba'i/ khyad par rnam dbye gsum pa tshig sdud kyis phyis pa dang skabs 'gar ma phyis kyang 'dra ste/ rtags sarba'i ming can rnams dga' ba thams cad kyi ched du/ la sarba'i bya ba mi 'jug par spyir btang
53b5(mdo 'grel): a thung mdza' can gyi cho ga byed pas/ dper na/ ma sa pUrbA ya/ ma san pUrbA ya/ lta bu'o/ /dwandwa tsa/ zlas dbye la'ang ngo/ /rtags mdza' a yig sarba'i ming can tshig sdud kyi khyad par bzlas dbye gnas pa las kyang sarba nA ma'i bya ba
53b6(mdo 'grel): rnams mi 'jug pas spyir btang gi cho gas bsgrubs pa'o/ /mtshungs pa'i don/ pUrba pA rA wa rA NAM/ suTa mi 'jug nuTa 'jug pa lta bu'o/ /bi b+hA ShA dza sita/ dzas la gdam nga'o/ /sarba nA ma las/ zlas dbye'i tshig sdud gnas pa la sarba'i ming
53b7(mdo 'grel): can gyi bya ba dang sbyir btang a thung tha can gyi cho ga rnam dbye dang po'i dzas la gdam shar pha rol gzhan rnams kyi/ nga bya ste/ shI ru 'gyur pa dang a ka 'dra ba'i cho ga gnyis ka 'jug pa'o/ /bar+NA sh+ra me ta re/ bar+Na sh+ra me ta rA(mdo 'grel): lta bu'o/ /pra tha ma tsar ma ti yA thad??
54a1(mdo 'grel): ka ti pa ya ni mA shta/ pra tha ma/ tsa ra ma/ ti ya/ alpa/ ard+ha/ ka ti pa ya/ ne ma rnams la yang ngo/ /pra tha ma sogs la yang rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas ni sarba sogs kyi skabs ltar shI ru 'gyur ba dang spyir
54a2(mdo 'grel): btang/ a thung mdza' can ltar aka 'dra ba'i dang po'am thog ma/ pags pa/ chung ngu/ phyed/ ji tsam khrims/ chog gnyis kar 'jug pas gdam da'o/ /pya tha me/ phra tha mA(mdo 'grel): tI ya'i rkyen sbyar ba ni/ dwi tI ye/ dwi tI yA(mdo 'grel): lta bu'o/ /pra tha ma sogs la dzas
54a3(mdo 'grel): ma gtogs rnam dbye lhag ma gzhan thams cad rA ma'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /'grel bar lung drangs pa/ tI ya sya ri tshu?? bwA sarba nA ma tA bA tsyA/ tI ya'i da dang po rnams/ 'gro ba rnams la sarba'i ming can gnyis pa rnams/ du yang na bshad do/ /tI ya'i
54a4(mdo 'grel): rkyen la yang nga 'gro ya'i ming can rnams sarba'i bya ba dang/ rA ma'i bya ba gnyis gdam nga can yin pas gnyis ka 'jug ste/ rnam dbye bzhi pa'i de la/ dwi tI yasmai/ dwi tI yA ya/ lnga pa/ dwi tI yasmAta/ dwi tI yAta/ bdun pa/ dwi tI ya smin
54a5(mdo 'grel): dwi tI ye/ lta bu'o/ /lhag ma rnams rA ma dar 'dra'o/ /dza rA yA dza ra san+ya ta ra syaM/ dza rA yA dza ras yang na'o/ /dza rA'i sgra la rnam dbye hal te gsal byang thog ma can rnams ma yin pa'i a ci thog ma can rnams la/ dza rA/ dza ras zhes
54a6(mdo 'grel): par bsgyur ba'o/ /su la ni rtA ra(mdo 'grel): a tsa la/ dza ras su bsgyur bas/ ni rdzas ros/ ni rdza ras(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa la/ ni rdza ra saM/ ni rdza ra sa(mdo 'grel): ni rdza ra la/ rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA/ 'dir 'grel par gzhan nas lung rgas/ drangs pa/ ke
54a7(mdo 'grel): rba pA dA ba tA tA wA de ma rgas shA bi tshan+ti/ la lar snga ma i na ata dag tu kun nas bsgyur bar 'dod do/ /zhes 'byung bas/ nirdza rA/ zhes pa'i rtags 'di/ ja ras/ dzar sa/ ja ra se na/ rnams su 'gyur bas/ ni rdza ra sA/ ni rdza ra se na
54b1(mdo 'grel): ni rdza re se nan ste gzugs gsum 'byung ngo/ /TA man chad rnam dbye thams cad la gzugs gsum du byed pa dang/ gzhung nyid kyis bshad pa ltar/ a tsa thog ma can rnams la dza ras su bsgyur/ hal thog ma can rnams la/ dza rA nyid du
54b2(mdo 'grel): gnas pa 'dam ka can du bya'o/ /ni rdza' sa/ ni rdza ra sA ya/ ni rdza ra sa nA ya/ zhes pa lta bu thams cad la rigs 'gre'o/ /pad+don+no mAs h+rin+ni sha sanbU? Sha na do Shi ya kany+tsha ka n+nu dan+nA sany+tsha sbra b+h+ri ti Shu/ shas la sogs pa rnams la/ btang ta nas mAs
54b3(mdo 'grel): h+rid ni sha a sa na pU Sha na do Sha na ya kan sha kan u dan A san rnams so/ /pa da la sogs pa 'di rnams la rnam dbye dang po gsum dang/ gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis chig rnams gong a thung mdza' can sbyir btang
54b4(mdo 'grel): rA ma'i skabs dang 'dra/ rnam dbye gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas nas brtsams te/ bdun pa'i mang tshigs sus kyi bar rnam dbye rnams gang byung yang/ pAd/ ni/ pad/ dan+ta ni/ data/ nA si kA ni/ nas/ mA sa ni/ mA sa h+ra da yen/ h+rid/ ni sha
54b5(mdo 'grel): zhes pa/ ni sha/ a sridza ni/ a san/ pU Sha ni/ pU Sha na/ do Sha/ nbi/ ngo Sha na/ a krita/ ni/ ya ka na/ sha krata/ ni/ sha ka na/ A da ku/ ni/ u da na/ A sa na rkad pa ga ni/ A san mche ga rnams sme su yang na mnyam pa'am mtshungs pa/ snying/ mi mthong ba
54b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur zhing/ skabs/ mi 'grog ma sbyin pa/ dag pa/ 'gar bu mtshan mo/ brgyud kyi rkyen thob par byed/ la'ang 'gyur ta nus/ /pa da ya/ la shas/ chud pa da ya/ pad du/ gdan/ 'gyur drangs/ pa da(mdo 'grel): grub/ de bzhin du bsgrub pas/ pa dA/ bad+d+haM/ bad+d+hi(mdo 'grel): da ta(mdo 'grel): da tA/
54b7(mdo 'grel): nga rbbyaM?? na sa(mdo 'grel): na sA/ no b+hyAM/ mA sa(mdo 'grel): mA sA/ mA b+hyAM/ h+ri da(mdo 'grel): h+ri dA/ hIrb+hyA/ ni sha(mdo 'grel): ni shA/ nidb+hyAM/ a sa na(mdo 'grel): a sa nA/ a sa b+hyA/ pUSh+Na(mdo 'grel): pUSha b+hUM/ doSh+Na(mdo 'grel): doSh+NA/ do Sha(mdo 'grel): yaknA/ ya ka b+hyAM/ sh+kna(mdo 'grel): sh+knA/ sha ka b+hyAM/ udna(mdo 'grel): nurnA'o/ /uda b+hyAM/ Asna(mdo 'grel): asnA
55a1(mdo 'grel): A sa b+hyAM/ zhes pa lta bu thams cad la rigs 'gre'o/ /h+ring sogs su ma 'gyur ba'i phyogs rA ma dang 'da' o/ /su Da na puMsa ka sya/ suTa ma ning ma yin pa'i'o/ /rnam dbye dang po'i gcig tshig su
55a2(mdo 'grel): nas gnyis pa'i gnyis tshig o ta'i bar lnga po rnams ma ning ma yin pa ste ma ning bor ba'i skyes pa'i rtags sogs la suT so sor bsdu ba'am/ suTa'i ming can nam thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i
55a3(mdo 'grel): ched cu brda chad byed do/ /swA di Shwa sarba nA ma s+thA ni/ su sogs rnams la thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa la'o/ /su sogs nyi shu rtsa gcig las gang du bshad pa ltar rnam dbye dang po'i su nas gnyis pa'i gnyis
55a4(mdo 'grel): tshig aau ta'i phar lnga po rnams thams cad gnas pa'i ming can dang/ lnga po rnams bor ba'i shas nas sub kyi bar rnams la thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis ming 'dogs byed de/ dgos
55a5(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ shes sogs thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa rnams kyi lnga ma'i ming da la rnam 'gyur byung ba'i phyir pa da zhes ming 'dogs byed de 'og nas ci rigs pa 'byung ngo/ /ya ci b+haM/ ya atsa la b+ha'o//
55a6(mdo 'grel): ya'i rkyen dang shas sogs thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa rnams kyi rnam dbye atsa ste dbyangs thog ma can rnams kyi snga ma'i ming ngam rtags de la b+ha zhes dgos pa'i ched du ming 'dogs byed de/ al+lo?
55a7(mdo 'grel): po na(mdo 'grel): na'i ata dbyi'o/ /rtags b+ha'i ming can gyi pU Sha na zhes pa lta bu'i pha rol tu shas sogs thams cad gnas pa'i ming can ma yin pa atsa thog ma can pha rol la rtags mdza' na srog med kyi snga ma'i a de
55b1(mdo 'grel): dbyi'o/ /pU Sha na la/ shas a phyis/ ra Sha sogs kyi mdos na Na drangs/ puSh+Na(mdo 'grel): pU Sha na la b+hyAM/ na lo pa(mdo 'grel): prA ti pa di kAM ta sya ming mdza' i na dbyi'o/ /ming mdza' i na srog med ni rnam dbye ha la thog ma can rnams la dbyi ste na phyis/ pUSha b+hyaM/ pUSha na la/
55b2(mdo 'grel): bdun pa'i de byin/ bi b+hA ShA di sh+yo(mdo 'grel): di shI dag la gdam nga'o/ /rnam dbya bdun pa'i nga dang shI ste/ ma ning gi rtags la aau ShIr bsgyur ba gnyis kyi snga ma'i rtags mdza' na srog med gnas pa'i a dbyi ba dang mi dbyi ba gang rung 'dam ka can du bya ste/ pUSh+Ni
55b3(mdo 'grel): pU Sha Ni/ saM khyA bi sA ya pUrba syA ha syha na n+ya ta ra syaM ngau/ grangs bi sA ya snga ma'i ah+na'i a han di la yang na'o/ /grangs rnams dang nyer bsgyur bi dang/ dgong mo'i skad dod/ sA ya rnams snga ma'i a h+na'i sgra ni rnam dbye bdun pa'i gcig tshig de la a
55b4(mdo 'grel): ha na zhes par yang na 'gyur te/ grangs thog ma can la/ dwi ah+na la di sbyin pas/ dwya has dbya h+ri/ dbya h+ni/ bi thog mar bzhag pa la/ bya h+ne bya hi na/ bya h+ni/ sA ya thog mar bzhag pa la/ sA yA h+ne/ sA yA h+ni/ zhes pa lta bu'i gzugs gsum gsum
55b5(mdo 'grel): byung ba'i rjes ma rnams na'i ata dbyi'o/ /zhes pas bsgrubs pa'o/ /zhes pa de rnams nyi ma gnyis/ nyi ma gnyis/ ni skyes pa'i rtags las a thung nyi bral/ mdza' can rnams so/ skyes pa'i rtags A ring mdza' can la/ bi shwa pA/ zhes pa'i rtags la dper brjod
55b6(mdo 'grel): na/ bi shwa pA zhes pa la/ rnam dbye dang po'i gig tshig/ su/ de dbyi 'os u phyis/ sa sa dzu Sha sogs dang/ khar sogs kyi mdos bsgrubs pas/ bi shwa pA(mdo 'grel): aau dang dzas la/ dI rg+hadzdza si ci/ ring po las dzas atsi sna tshogs 'thung/ la'o/ /a yig ring po'i
55b7(mdo 'grel): mdza' las pha rol gyi rnam dbye itsa so sor bsta ba dang po can chams dang dzas la/ dang po dag la snga ma 'dra ba'o/ /zhes pa'i mdo'i cho ga 'jug pa ma yin te/ e tsa'i 'phel ba dang/ a ka 'dra ba la ring po byas pas/ bi shwa pau/ ba shwa pA(mdo 'grel): gnyis
56a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i gcig tshig la/ am la snga ma 'os/ bi shwa pI/ gnyis tshig la/ bi shwa bau/ mang tshig shas la/ A to d+hA to(mdo 'grel): byings kyi'o/ rnam dbye gnyis pa'i shas nas brtsams te/ bdun pa'i sbu kyi bar gyi rnam

56a4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ so ma pA/ kA wA la pA/ shaM khaM d+h+na/ hA hA/ snA la sogs pa mang po dag kyang ba shwa pA dang bya ba 'dra ba'o/ /zhes pa skyes pa'i rtags kyi a ring mdza' can gyi bya ba bshad zin to/ /~ da ni skyes pa'i rtags i thung mdza' can gyi bya
56a5(mdo 'grel): ba rnams bshad zhib ba thung/ /chu 'thung/ dung yo ga bar 'dra ba/ bye ste/ ha ri la/ rnams dbye dang po'i gcig tshig /su/ sa sa dzuSha dang khar sogs kyi mdos/ ha ri(mdo 'grel): ha ri la/ aau/ dang po dag la/ zhes pas/ ha rI/ ha ri la dzas/ dza si tsha/ dzas la 'dor?
56a6(mdo 'grel): i ma so sor bsdu ba thung du rnams kyi pha rol rnam dbye 'phrog byed/ dang po'i mang tshig jes mthong na rtags ang+ga'i ming can de yon tan du 'gyur te/ ha re/ dzas/ dza phyis/ e tsa'i a ya a wa sogs kyi mdos/ ha ra ya(mdo 'grel): ha ri la
56a7(mdo 'grel): kun tu bod pa'i gcig tshig saM bud+d+hi'i ming can/ su h+ra swa sya gu Na(mdo 'grel): thung du'i yon tan no/ /i ka thung du rnams saM bud+d+hi la yon tan du 'gyur te/ te ha re/ su/ thung du dang eng la zhes pas/ su phyis/ he ha re/ gnyis tshig dang mar
56b1(mdo 'grel): tshig gong rnam dbye dang po dang 'dra bas/ he ha rI/ he ra ya(mdo 'grel): ha ri la/ gnyis pa'i am dang/ aau/ am la snga ma'o zhes pa dang/ dang po dgra la zhes pas/ ha riM/ ta rI/ ha ri la/ shas sha byis/ dang po dag la zhes pas/ ha rIs/ de yang shas kyi
56b2(mdo 'grel): na skyes pa la'o/ /zhes pas sa srog med na/ ha rIn/ ha ri la gsum pa'i/ TA/ sho Sho g+hya sa khi/ sa khi ma yin pa la lhag ma g+hi'o/ /na dI ming can dang rtags i ka so sor bsdu ba thung du rnams kyi nang nas sa khi ma yin pa ste/ sa khi'i sgra bo bI
56b3(mdo 'grel): i ka thung du'i mdza' rnams kyi pha rol tu rnams dbye lhag ma ste/ dang po dang gnyis pa ma yin pa'i rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA nas brtsams te/ bdun pa'i sub kyi bar pha rol tu byung na rtags mdza' i dbyangs de la g+hi zhes ming rtags byed de dgos
56b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i ched du'o/ /A ngo na stri yaM/ bud med ma yin pa la Ar gi nA'o/ /rtags mdza' g+hi'i ming can gyi pha rol Ang ste/ TA ni bud med kyi rtags ma yin pa la nA ra 'gyur ro/ /ha ri NA/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshigs bya ba lhag po med bas/ ha
56b5(mdo 'grel): raM b+hyaM/ hya ri b+hyaM(mdo 'grel): ha ri la/ bzhi pa'i de/ g+he rdi ti/ g+hi'i nga 'gro ba las so/ /rtags mdza' g+hi'i ming can de pha rol rnam dbye nga 'gro nga'i ming can rnams dang phrad na rtags mdza' g+hi'i ming can de yon tan du 'gyur bas/ ha re/ de/ nga phyis/

57a1(mdo 'grel): hi ri/ os/ i ka gi zhes pas/ ha rmo:?? ha ri/ thung ngu sogs kyis nuT/ ra Sha dag la zhes pas/ na Na/ nA ma la 'os rtags mdza' ring por 'gyur/ ha rI NAM/ ha ri la/ ngi/ a tstsa g+he(mdo 'grel): g+hi'i a ta yang ngo/ /rtags

57a4(mdo 'grel): snyan ngag saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i su la rtags mdza' a grogs po/ nang du 'gyur te/ sa kha na/ su/ a lon+tya tpU rba u pa d+hA/ a la mdza' las snga ma u pa d+h+rA'o/ /rtags mdza' al te gsal byed dam skabs 'gar dbyangs kyang rung ste mdza' i snga
57a5(mdo 'grel): ma'i yi ge de ni u pad+hA'i ming can no/ /sarba nA ma smA ne tsA saM bud+d+hau/ saM bud+d+hai ma yin pa'i thams cad gnas pa'i ming can la yang ngo/ /rtags mdza' na yig srog med kyi u pa d+hA'i a ce de ni bod pa'i don du sbyin pa'i su/ saM bud+d+ha'i ming can
57a6(mdo 'grel): ma yin pa'i thams cad gnas pa'i ming chan gyi rna mi dbye rnams la ring por 'gyur ro/ /sa khA na su/ a pri kha e kA la pra hya ya(mdo 'grel): rkyen al gcig pa a brik+ta'o/ /rkyen al gcig ba ste yi ge srog ldan dang gnyis gsum lta bu ma yin
57a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i gsal byed srog med gcig po de la/ a prik+ta'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis ming 'dogs byed do/ /hal dyA b+hyo/ dI rg+hA ta su ti sya brik+taM hal/ hal dI pa/ A pa/ ring po rnams las su ti si a praM k+ta'i hal 'o/ /rtags mdza' 
57b1(mdo 'grel): la ha la te gsal byed srog med dang/ bud med du bsgrub pa'i rkyen dI pa dang/ A ba kyi mdza' dang ring po rnams las/ su dang/ ti sogs kyi ti dang/ si rnams kyi u dang i phyis pas/ hal a ce med pa'i yi ge gcig pa/ a bri t+ta'i ming can de la??
57b2(mdo 'grel): dbyi bar bya ste/ su phyis/ sa khA na/ ming mdza' i na dbyi'o zhes pas/ na phyis/ sa khA/ sa khyu ra saM bud+d+ho/ sa khi las sa bu d+d+hi ma yin pa la'o/ /sa khi'i skabs 'dir kun tu bod pa'i don gyi gcig tshig saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i dang po'i su nas gnyis
57b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i aau ba'i bar gyi rnam dbye lnga po sngar thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes brda chang byas pa de rnams la skabs 'dir Ni ta ste/ Na 'gro ba'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i ched du ming 'dogs byed do/ /sa khi la/ dang po'i aau dang dzas/ gnyis
57b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i am dang aau rnams spyin/ a tse nyNai ti/ nya Na 'gro ba la a ca'i'o/ /pha rol tu nya Na 'gro ba'i ming can byung na rtags mdza' i a tsa ste dbyangs de 'phel bar 'gyur bas skabs 'dir yang aau sogs bzhi la Na yig 'gro ba'i ming
57b5(mdo 'grel): can zhes ming 'dogs byas pa'i dgos pa ni 'di yin pas rtags mdza' 'phel pa/ e ci'i a ya a wa sogs kyi mngos/ sa khA yau/ sa khA ya(mdo 'grel): sa kA yaM? pA yau/ sa khi la/ kun tu phong pa'i su sbyin saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa zhes bas skabs 'dir
57b6(mdo 'grel): bshad ma thag pa'i bya ba mi 'jug /gong ha ri'i skabs dang 'dra pas/ hes khe/ gnyis tshig dag mang tshig bshad ma thag pa'i rnam dbye dang pa'i gnyis tshig dang mang tshig ltar bsgrubs pas/ he sa khA ya/ he sa pA ya(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas
57b7(mdo 'grel): kyi skabs? ha ri dang 'dra pas/ ma khI na/ gsum pa rnams la/ sa khya/ sa khi b+hi(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa la/ sa khi b+hyaM/ sa khi b+hya(mdo 'grel): sa khi la/ lnga pa'i/ nga si sbyin/ khya t+ta tA ra sya/ khi ti dag las pha rol gyi a'i'o/ /rtags mdza' khi ring po dang thun du
58a1(mdo 'grel): ti ring po dang thung du rnams kyi pha rol rnam dbye lnga pa dang drug pa'i nga si dang ngas gnyis kyi nga phyis pa'i a de ni u ru 'gyur te/ sa byu(mdo 'grel): sa khi b+h+raM/ sa khi b+hya(mdo 'grel): si khi la rnam dbye drug pa rnams/ sa khyu(mdo 'grel): sa khyo(mdo 'grel): sa khI
58a2(mdo 'grel): nAM/ sa khi la/ bdun pa'i di byin/ aau'o/ /rtags na dI'i ming can dang ste'i ming can ma yin pa'i i thung dang u thung dag las pha rol gyi rnam dbye bdun pa'i di ni o ru 'gyur te/ nge aau/ i ka gi a tsal/ yaN/ sa khyau/
58a3(mdo 'grel): gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ sa khyo(mdo 'grel): sa khyi Shu/ pa ti(mdo 'grel): sa mA sa e wa?/ pa ti tshig sdung med pa 'di bzhin no/ /pa ti'i sgra tshig sdung med pa ste/ pa ti zhes pa lta bu la sa khi'i sgra kho na'i bya ba rnams 'jug la/ tshig sdud dang 'brel
58a4(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ dper na/ pra dzA pa ti lta bu la ni g+hi'i ming can yin pas sbyir btang i thung mdza' can ha ri'i skabs dang cho ga thams cad 'dra'o/ /i thung mdza' dag go 'can ka ti'i sgra la ni mang tshig kho na 'jug la gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig
58a5(mdo 'grel): dag mi 'jug skye rgu'i bdag po/ go /ba hu ga Na pa tu Da ti saM khyA/ mang du 'dren pa ba tu Da ti rnams saM khya'o/ /mar ru 'dren pa ste se mang tshig /'o na thob pa rnams dang/ ba tu dang/ Da ti'i rkyen rnams la saM khyu'i ming can zhes dgos pa'i dbang gis
58a6(mdo 'grel): ming 'dogs byed do/ /Ta ti tse/ Da ti tso/ Da ti la yang ngo/ /gong du bshad pa'i saM khyA'i ming can de rnams kyi nang ni sa kyang ka ta lti buD ti'i rkyen mdza' can de la Sha Ta'i ming can zhes slar yang ming 'dogs byed do/ /pra Tya ya sya lu pa(mdo 'grel): rkyen gyi
58a7(mdo 'grel): lu kra shlu du pa rnams so/ /pha rol gyi rkyen dbyi ba de la lu ka 'am shlUAm lug zhes zer ro/ /dper na/ dzas/ lu ka zer ba 'am/ dzas shlu zer ba'am/ dzas lub zer ba lta bu gang byung yang/ dzas de dbyib kho na'o/ /ki ti la/ ji tsam rna mar bye dang pa'i mang
58b1(mdo 'grel): tshig dzas dang/ gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas gnyis byin/ Sha Db+hyo lu ka/ laT rnams las dbyi'o/ /Sha Ta'i ming can gyi rtags las pha rol rnam dbye dang po'i mang tshig dzas dang/ gnyis pa'i mang tshig shas rnams dbyi ste/ ka ti'i sgra Sha Ta'i ming can yin
58b2(mdo 'grel): pas/ dzas shas/ dag phyis/ ka ti/ ka ti zhes pa grub/ pra tya ya lo pa pra tya ya la k+Sha NaM/ rkyen phyis pa la rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do/ /pha rol rkyen phyis kyang rkyen byin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rkyen gyi bya ba thob bo zhes rtags mdza' i i er 'gyur ba'i spyir btang thob kyang
58b3(mdo 'grel): na lu ma tAM ga sya/ phyis pa la a ng+ga'i ma yin no/ /zhes dmigs bsal lu ka 'am shlu 'am lub zhes pa'i sgras rkyen phyis zin pa de la/ Ang+ga te/ rtags de la bya ba med pas/ ga te zhes mi 'gyur bar ka ti nyid du gnas so/ /rnam dbye gsum pa'i mang
58b4(mdo 'grel): tshig la/ ka ti b+hi(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa la/ ka ti b+hya(mdo 'grel): lnga pa la/ ka ti b+hya(mdo 'grel): drug pa la/ ki tA nAM/ bdun pa las/ ka ti Shu/ bod tshig la/ he ka ti/ zhes pa lta bu'o/ /a thung mdza' can tri'i sgra la yang grangs bgrang ba'i skabs su mar tshig kho na sbyor bas/ gsum/ tri la/ rnam dbye dang po
58b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ gnyis pa/ gsum pa/ bzhi pa/ lnga pa rnams kyi mang tshig rnams byin/ gong hir ltar bsgrubs pas/ tA ya(mdo 'grel): tI na/ tI b+hi(mdo 'grel): twi b+hi(mdo 'grel): sli b+hya(mdo 'grel): tril/ drug pa'i mang tshig A ma/ tre(mdo 'grel): tra ya(mdo 'grel): tri'i tra ya'o/ /rnam dbye drug pa'i A ma pha rol la tri zhes
58b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i sgra ni tra ya zhes par 'gyur te/ tri tra ya/ thung du zhes pas nuT/ nAm la 'os rtags mdza' ring po/ /raSha sogs kyi mdos/ na Na/ tra yA NA/ bdun pa la/ tri Shu/ bod tshig /he tra ya(mdo 'grel): i thung mdza' can dwi'i sgra la yang grangs bgrang ba'i
58b7(mdo 'grel): skabs su gnyis tsig kho na sbyor ro/ /tya dI dI nA ma(mdo 'grel): byad sogs rnams kyi a'o/ /byad la sogs te byar nas rwi'i bar brgyad po rnams pha rol rnam dbye gang mthong yang rtags mdza' a ru 'gyur te/ dwi la/ gnyis rnam dbye dang po dang gnyis
59a1(mdo 'grel): pa gnyis kyi gnyis chig /aau/ dwi'i i a mtshams sbyar bas/ dwau dwau/ rnam dbye gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa dang/ lnga pa rnams la/ dwA b+hyaM/ dwA b+hyAM/ dwA b+hya/ drug pa dang/ bdun pa la/ da yo(mdo 'grel): da lo(mdo 'grel): dwe'i
59a2(mdo 'grel): sgra la ming dang nyer bsgyur thog ma can rnams la dwi'i i ar mi 'gyur zhing/ rnam dbye yang su nas ba'i bar thams cad 'jug la de'i tshe cho ga yang sbyir btang i thung mdza' cen ta ri'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /de yan gyis skyes
59a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i rtags i thung mdza' can gyi sde chan sbyin btang dmigs bsal ded bcas rags pa rnams bshad zin to/ /~ da ni skyes pa'i rtags a'i ring mdza' can ni/ bA ta phra mI la/ su/ sa sa dzu la'i mdo dang/ khar sogs kyi
59a4(mdo 'grel): mdes/ bA ta pra mI(mdo 'grel): bA ta pra mI la/ aau dang dzas i ka gi a tsa la yaN 'os/ bA ta pra myau/ bA da bra mya(mdo 'grel): rnam dbye gnyis pa la/ bA ta pra mI/ bA ta pra myau/ ba ta pra mIn/ ri dwags thiSh+Na?/ gsum pa la/ bA tapra mA/ bA ta
59a5(mdo 'grel): bra myi(mdo 'grel): bA ta pra mI Shu/ bong tshig /te bA ta pra mI(mdo 'grel): he bU ta pra mya te bA ta bra ma(mdo 'grel): rnam a grub ste cho ga go bde'o/ /de bzhin/ de wa ya dzAM/ a ti lik+Shi/ la sogs ba mang po dag cho ga 'di kho na dang 'dra'o/ /a'i ring mdza' 
59a6(mdo 'grel): can byings gnas pa rnams bya ba cung mi 'dra ste/ sud+d+hA li/ zla bzang dam legs ba'i blo/ su/ su/ d+dd+hi? la/ aau dang/ dzas/ a tsi sh+nu d+hA tu lha mchod pa/ b+hU wA yo she ni tu kun? dum chogs la/ /ri ya du wa ngau/ /a co la sh+ni? byangs?
59b1(mdo 'grel): b+hU rnams kyi i u ngag gi i ya u wa dag go /pha rol a tsa ste dbyangs gang mthong yang rkyen sh+nu dang byings kyi i ring thung u ring thung/ b+hI'i? sgra rnams kyi i rnam i yang dang/ u rnams u wa ru 'gyur zhing/
59b2(mdo 'grel): sbyir btang i ka gi ya Na'o zhes ba thob kyang/ na b+hU sud+d+hi yo(mdo 'grel): b+hU sud+d+hI dag la ma yin no/ /b+hU dang su d+d+hI dag gi a'i a'u dag a tsa pha rol la a Nar 'gyur ba mi yin te/ i yar bsgyur bas/ mud+d+hi so/ sud+d+hi ya(mdo 'grel): rnam dbye gnyis pa rnams
59b3(mdo 'grel): la/ sud+d+hi yaM/ sud+d+hi yau/ sud+d+hi ya(mdo 'grel): gsum pa la/ sud+d+hi yA/ sud+d+hA b+hyeM/ sud+d+hI b+hi(mdo 'grel): ltA bu ste/ rnam dbye lhag ma rnams la yang hal thog ma can rnams la bya ba med/ a tsa thog ma can rnams la a yer bsgyur ba kha na yin pas go bde kho/
59b4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ su sh+rI/ gong ya wa grI sogs kyang rig par bya'i/ /bra d+hI la/ su/ pra d+hwi(mdo 'grel): pra d+hI la/ aau/ dzas/ e ra na kA ca saM yo ga pU rba sbya/ a'i'i a tsa mang po'i snga ma brtsegs ba ma yin pa'i'o/ /rtags mdza' byings kyi a'i yig dang a'u
59b5(mdo 'grel): gzugs mdzes sam dpal lam phun sum tshogs pa'am bde bar 'byor ga /yig a tsa gcig pa ma yin pa sti dbyangs gnyis sam mang po yad pa sngon na yi ge mang po brtsags pa med pa de ni a tsa pha rol la ya Nar 'gyur te/ pra d+dyau/ pra d+hya(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa la/ pa d+hyaM:
59b6(mdo 'grel): pra d+hyau/ pra d+hya(mdo 'grel): gsum pa/ pa d+hyA(mdo 'grel): pra d+hI b+huaM/ pra d+hI b+hi(mdo 'grel): rnam dbye lhag ma rnams kyang rigs 'gro'o/ /'di dang 'dra ba ni/ ngi d+hI/ su d+hA la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo/ /a tsa mang ba zhes bas dbyangs gcig pa la bshad ma thag pa'i bya ba mi
59b7(mdo 'grel): 'jug ste/ dper na/ nI slen gzhes pa a ca gcig pa yin pas bra d+hI'i bya ba rnams mi 'jug /rnam dbye bdun pa'i di ma 'din/ blo bzang/ gtogs cho ga thams cad su d+hI'i skabs dang 'dra ste/ nI(mdo 'grel): ni yau/ ni ya(mdo 'grel): lta bu rigs 'gre/ bdun pa'i de la cung
60a1(mdo 'grel): phrong? snga'i dran mkhan?/ mi 'dra ste/ nI la di/ de rAM na dyamni b+hya(mdo 'grel): di'i A ma/ na dI A pa nI rnams las so/ /rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi ni bud med kyi rtags/ /na dI ming can rnams dang/ A pa kyi mdza' rnams dang/ ni'i sgra rnams la la A ma ru 'gyur te
60a2(mdo 'grel): ni yAM/ grA ma NI yang rnam dbye bdun pa'i gcig tshig di ma gtogs pra d+hI'i skabs dang 'dra/ de la bshad ma thag pa nA dang 'dra ste/ grAm NI(mdo 'grel): grwa ma N+ya(mdo 'grel): sogs dang/ bdun pa la/ grA ma Ni yAM/ a bI dang pa tI ring pa'i mdza' can yang rnams dbye
60a3(mdo 'grel): lnga ba'i nge si dang/ drug pa'i ngas ma gtogs rnam dbye gzhan thams cad la cho ga pra d+hI dang 'dra/ zhing/ ngas si/ ngas gnyis la sa khI dang/ pa tI la'/ nga si dang das byin/ /li ti dag las pha rol gyi i'i 'o zhes pas nga si dang
60a4(mdo 'grel): ngas kyi a u mtshams sbyar/ sa khyu(mdo 'grel): ba tyu(mdo 'grel): drug pa yang gzugs dang bsgrub tshul gnyis ka 'dra'o/ /l+lu nI'i sgra yang rnam dbye bdun pa'i ngi la nI'i skabs dang 'dra zhing/ di ma yin pa'i rnam dbye ba zhan thams cad la prad+hI'i skabs kyi cho ga dang
60a5(mdo 'grel): 'dra'o/ /de ltar skyes pa'i rtags las a'i ring mdza' can sbyir btang dmiT ba la dang bcas par To pa zhi rda bar byed/ pa shad zin to/ /byung ni skyes pa'i rtags u thung gi bya ba rnams bshad par bya ste/ she b+hu la/ su sa sa shu Sha zhes dang/ khar
60a6(mdo 'grel): dang zhes pa'i mngos/ sho b+hu(mdo 'grel): shaM b+hu la/ aau/ dang po dag gi zhes pas/ shaM b+hA/ shaM b+hu la/ dzas/ dzas/ la'ang ngos/ /u o mtshams sbyar/ shaM b+ha wa(mdo 'grel): shaM b+hu la/ aM/ aM la snga ma 'os/ shaM b+huM/ aau gong
60a7(mdo 'grel): dang 'dra pas/ shaM b+hA/ shaM b+h+ru lnga chen po/ la shas/ dang po dag la zhes deng/ de yang shaMs kyin zhes pas/ shaM b+hUn/ shaM b+hu la/ Tu bung med ma yin pa la/ Ang gi nA'o zhes pas/ shaM b+hu nA/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig shaM b+h+ru b+hyuM/ shaM b+hu b+hi(mdo 'grel): shaM b+hu
60b1(mdo 'grel): 'ang nge/ g+hi'i nga 'gro ba las so zhes pas u o mtshams sbyar/ sha b+ha we/ gnyis tshig dang mang tshig la/ shaM b+hu dt+taM/ shaM b+hyu b+hya(mdo 'grel): shaM b+hu la/ nga si/ g+hi'i nga 'gro ba zhes dang/ dsi/ ngas dag gi zhes pa'i mdos/ shaM b+ho(mdo 'grel): shaM b+hu b+hyAM/ shi b+hu b+hya(mdo 'grel): shaM b+hwa la/ ngas
60b2(mdo 'grel): byin/ da si'i skrabs dang 'dra bas/ shaM b+ho(mdo 'grel): shi b+hwo(mdo 'grel): shi stU nrAM/ shaM b+hu la/ di g+hi'i ang yang ngo/ /shaM b+ho/ sham b+hwa(mdo 'grel): shaM b+hU Sh/ bong tshig /he shaM b+ho/ he shaM b+hU/ he shaM b+ha wa(mdo 'grel): rnams grub st/e sbyir btang u thung mdza' can shaM stu'i sgra dang i thung
60b3(mdo 'grel): mdza' can ha ri'i skabs rnams dbyangs mi 'dra ba'i 'gyur khyad phran bu ma gtogs cho ga khyed par med do/ /pi sh+nu/ bA yul/ pA nu la sogs te skyes pa'i rtags sbyir btang u thung mdza' can thams cad 'di dang 'dra'o/ /u thung mdza' can gyi
60b4(mdo 'grel): nang tshan/ kroSh+Tu'i? cho ga sbyir btang dang cung mi 'dra ste/ kroSh+Tu la/ su/ tri dzi ta kroSh+Ta(mdo 'grel): kroSh+Ta'i tri tsa bzhin no/ /kroSh+Ta khyab 'jug / rlung/ nyi ma/ zhes pa'i skra ni sa bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i rnam dpye dad pa'i su nas/ gnyis pa'i aau Ta'i bar thams cad gnas pa'i ming
60b5(mdo 'grel): can zhes brda chad byas pa/ de rnams pha rol tu byung na kri ta ce sbyang kyi rkyen tri ca'i mdza' can dang bya ba 'dro pas rtags mthu'i u nga rir 'gyur te/ kroSh+Ti/ su/ ri du sha na spur ra daM sho nya ne ha sAM tsa/ ri ta u sha nas pu ra daM shas/ a ne has
60b6(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi yang ngo/ /rtags ri ta mdza' rnams dang u sha nas/ pu ra daM shas/ a ne has rnams kyi rnams mdza' ni saM bud+d+hi ma yin pa'i su la a nang du 'gyur te/ na'i a dang da 'gro ba yin pas phyis/ saM bu d+d+hi ma yn pa'i zhes pa'i
60b7(mdo 'grel): mngos u pa d+hA ring por song/ hal dI A ra zhes pas su phyis/ ming mdza' na dbye 'os na byis pa/ kroSh+TA/ kroSh+Tu la/ dang pa'i aau dang dzas/ gnyis pa'i aM dang aauTa rnams byin/ ri to di san nA ma s+thA na yo(mdo 'grel): ri ta kyi di thams cad gnas
61a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i ming can dag las so/ /rtags rta mdza' can las rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams dang rnam dbye bdun pa'i pha rol la rtags mdza' yon tan du 'gyur te/ ri ar du bsgur/ i b+h+ra? ni
61a2(mdo 'grel): tsra swa sri na pitwa ne ShiDta k+Sha tri ho dri po tri pra sha stI NAM/ a pa tri na tri tsa swa sri na btri ne ShiTra twa ShiTa k+Sha tri ho tri bo traM pa shi sta rnams kyi'o/ /rtags a pa dang kri ta kyi rkyen trin dang tri tsa gnyis byin pa'i mdza' dang/ rtags swa sraM la sogs
61a3(mdo 'grel): par gu bo ni saM bu d+d+hi ma yin pa'i rnam dbye thams cad gnas pa'i ming can rnams la u ba d+hA ring por 'gyur te/ kro Sh+Ta'a ro/ kro Sh+TA raM/ gro Sh+TA ro/ shas la shaM b+hu dang 'dra bas/ kro Sh+TA na/ kro Sh+TA la gsum pa'i TA/ bi b+hA ShA
61a4(mdo 'grel): tri tI yA di ShA tsi/ gsum pa sogs rnams la a tsa la 'dam ka'o/ /kro Sh+TA'i sgra la pha rol tu rnam dbye gsum pa sogs te gsum pa'i TA nas/ bdun pa'i os kyi bar a tsa thog ma can rnams gang byung yang sbyir btang u thung
61a5(mdo 'grel): mdza' can shaM sdu'i skabs kyi bya ba dang/ bshad ma thag pa bzhin rtags mdza' rir 'gyur ba'i phyogs gnyis ka thob pas 'dam ka can du bya ste/ kro Sh+TA/ kro Sh+TA nA/ kro Sh+TA b+hAM/ kro Sh+TA b+hi(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa la/ kro SheTA/ kro Sh+Ta wa/
61a6(mdo 'grel): kro Sh+TA b+hyaM(mdo 'grel): kro Sh+TU b+hya(mdo 'grel): kro Sh+Tu la lnga pa'i/ nga si/ shaM b+hu ltar bsgrubs pas/ kro ShoTa(mdo 'grel): rir 'gyur pa'i phyogs la/ ri ta ur/ ri ta las ura'o/ /rtags ri ta mdza' can la pha rol rnam dbye lang pa'i nga mi
61a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ drug pa'i ngas dag gi a dang rtags mdza' ri gnyis 'dus par ur du 'gyur te/ kro Sh+Tra/ u ru su/ /zhes pa la/ rA twa sya/ ra las sa'i 'o/ /ra yig srog med las pha rol gyi sa yig
61b1(mdo 'grel): srog med ni dbyi bar bya ste/ sa phyis/ ra rnams bcang byas pas/ kro Sh+Tu(mdo 'grel): b+hya ma b+hyas la/ kro Sh+Tu b+hyaM/ kro Sh+Tu b+hya drug pa'i ngas yang bya ba lnga pa'i nga si dang 'dra bas/ kro Sh+To:
61b2(mdo 'grel): kro Sh+Tu(mdo 'grel): os la/ kro Sh+Towa(mdo 'grel): kro Sh+To(mdo 'grel): kro Sh+Tya la drug pa'i A ma shi b+hu ltar bsgrubs pas/ kro Sh+Tu nAM/ lugs gcig la/ nu ma ci ra tra dzra db+hA be b+hyo nu Ta/ ra a tsa la num tra tsa bzhin 'gyur
61b3(mdo 'grel): ba rnams kyi nu TO/ /rtags mdza' ra yig a tsa dang ldan pa num A ga ma thob pa rnams dang kro Sh+Tu tri tsa bzhin du 'gyur ba'i pha rol rnam dbye drug pa'i mang tshig a'u ma la nu Ta A ga ma nges par 'jug ste/ nu Ta
61b4(mdo 'grel): A ga ma byin pas/ kro ShiTA NAM/ rnam dbye bdun pa'i ral/ kro Sh+Ta ri/ kro ShoTa/ os la/ kro Sh+To(mdo 'grel): kra Sh+To(mdo 'grel): sub la/ kroSh+Tu shu/ bod tshig /he kro Sh+To/ he kro Sh+TA rau/ he kro Sh+TA ra(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa'i
61b5(mdo 'grel): shas ma yang na kro Sh+Ti na zhes pa'ang 'byung ngo/ /de yan gyis skyes pa'i rtags kyi u thung mdza' can spyir btang dmigs bsal rnams bshad zin to/ /?? da ni skyes pa'i dri thang rtaD las a'u ring mdza' can
61b6(mdo 'grel): gyi bya ba rnams ston par byed de/ hU hU zhes pa'i sgra la dper brjod du bya ste/ dbyangs mi 'dra ba'i 'gyur khyad phran bu ma gtogs bA ta pra mI dang 'dra bas/ hU hU/ rnam dbye dang po rnams byin/ gong ltar gyi tshogs bsgrubs pas/ hU hU(mdo 'grel): hU hwau/ hU hA(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa la/ hU hwaM
61b7(mdo 'grel): hU dwa/ hU dwa(mdo 'grel): gsum pa la/ hU hA/ hU hU b+hyaM/ hU hU b+hi(mdo 'grel): lta bu ste a ca thag ma can rnams la/ u war 'gyur/ ha la thog ma can rnams la bya ba lhag po med pas go bde'o/ /de bzhin du/ a ti tsa shin tu gong ba ma la soD pa spyid btang a'u ring/ skyes pa'i rtags so
62a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad tshog 'di dang 'dra'o/ /a'u ring mdza' can kha la pU las byin/ khal pU kha la blu la/ aau/ o(mdo 'grel): su po/ u 'a su ba la'o/ /byings kyi u rnam dbye dang po'i su nas/ bdun pa'i mang tshig ba'i bar gyi a ce thog ma can gang byung yang a'u de ??
62a2(mdo 'grel): nar 'gyur te/ de yang mdza' a'u de'i sngon du yi ge gnyis sam gsuM so yod pa yi gi brtsegs pa med de bzhig dgos so/ /kha la pwau/ kha la pwa(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa rnams la/ kha la thwa/ kha la p+pau/ kha la pwa(mdo 'grel): gsum pa rnams la/ kha la pwA/ kha la pU b+hyaM/ kha la
62a3(mdo 'grel): bU b+haM(mdo 'grel): sogs te bsgrub tshul rigs 'gro'o/ /sU l+lu la sogs ba yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /swa shU zhes pa/ su d+d+hi'i skabs dang 'dra bas/ su la swa ba(mdo 'grel): rnam dbye a tsa thogs can rnams la/ u war 'gyur bas/ swa b+hu wau/ sa b+hu wa(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa la/
62a4(mdo 'grel): su b+hu wi/ swa b+hu lbau/ spa b+hu wa(mdo 'grel): gsum pa la/ ligs gcod/ lnga klu lnga/ sba b+hu b+hyaM(mdo 'grel): sba bdag yang/ bu b+hi(mdo 'grel): so 'gas so/ /ka Ta sru/ sba ya b+hu/ so gis kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /b+hU su diTA dag la ma yin no/ /zhes pas/ yan ra 'gyur ba ma yin kyang dmiD
62a5(mdo 'grel): bsal ba rShA b+hU zhes pa'i sgra ni b+h+ru'i mdza' yin kyang yaN ra 'gyur te/ su ba barSha b+hU(mdo 'grel): barShA b+hU la aau/ bar b+hwa shtsa/ /birShA b+hU zhes pa'i sgra 'di su sogs kyi rnam dbye a tsa thog ma can rnams la yan ra 'gyur te/ a'u war bsgyad bas/ barSh+Ta?
62a6(mdo 'grel): lo dus su 'byung ba/ b+hwau barSh+Ta b+hwa(mdo 'grel): sogs/ kha la pUI skabs dang 'dra'o/ /'grel bar/ dri gb+ha/ kA rA b+hU/ pu na rb+hu rnams kyang barShA b+hUI dang 'dra'o zhes byung bas/ 'di rnams la yang rnam dbye byin pa'i bya ba thams cad barThA b+hA dang 'dra bas bshad ma
62a7(mdo 'grel): thag pa'i tshogs bsgrub pa'i/ /de ltar a'u mdza' can las skyes pa'i rtags kyi byang/ byed ba 'byung rnams slang yang phung bo/ bshad zin to/ de ni skyes pa'i rtags ri yig mdza' can gyi tshog rnams ston par bya ste/ d+hA tro ba'i ni byed su di ta u sha
62b1(mdo 'grel): nas/ bur dam shas a ne ha sa rnams kyi yod/ /zhes pas/ ri a nang/ saM bud d+hI ma yin ba'i zhes pas u pad+hA 'di bo/ /hal drI A ba ces pas su phyis/ ming mdza' i na dbyi 'os/ na phyis pas/ d+hA tA/ /d+hA tri la dang po'i yo dang jas/ gnyis pa'i i dang aau rnams byin/ rita
62b2(mdo 'grel): kyang thams cad gnas pa'i ming can dag las so/ /zhes pas/ ri a du pa sbyar/ ang tri na tri tsa sogs kyi mdos/ u pa d+hA ring bo drang ?/ d+hA tA ro/ d+hA tA ra(mdo 'grel): d+hA tA ra/ d+hA tA rau/ d+hA tri la shas/ dag bo dag la snga ma 'dra ba'o dang/ de yang shas kyi na skyes pa la
62b3(mdo 'grel): 'os/ d+hA trI na/ gsum ba la/ d+ha tra/ d+hA tri b+hyaM/ d+hA tri b+hi(mdo 'grel): bzhi ba la/ d+h+ra rti/ d+hA tri b+hyaM/ d+ha tri b+hAM d+hA tri/ nga si/ rita las uMra 'o zhes dang/ ra las sa'i 'o zhes bas/ d+hA tu(mdo 'grel): b+h+ra tri b+hyaM/ d+hA tri b+hya(mdo 'grel): drug ba'i gcig tshig kyang nga si dang 'dra bas/ d+hA rtu(mdo 'grel): os la da d+hA rto:
62b4(mdo 'grel): A ma la/ ra a cas/ kyis nuT/ nAm la 'os rtags mdza' ring bo/ 'grel pa da lung dra nges ba/ ri br+Na n+na sya Na ni bA cyaM/ nga las na'i Na ra brjod do/ /ra Sha gnyis su ma zad dbyangs ri'i pha rol gyi na yang nar 'gyur ti/ d+hA trI NA/ bdun pa'i di la rita gyi di thams cad
62b5(mdo 'grel): gnas pa zhes pas yon tan/ d+hA te ri/ /d+hA tro(mdo 'grel): d+hA tri Shu/ kun tu bod ba'i su la/ rita kyi de thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes pas yon tan/ ha d+hA ta(mdo 'grel): gnyis tshig dang mang tshig dang bo'i skabs dang 'dra/ hi d+hA tA ro/ he d+hA tA ral de bzhin du/
62b6(mdo 'grel): na?/ ho tri/ bo ti sogs mang po zhig 'di dang 'dra'o/ /po tri la/ bu gong bzhin sgrubs pas/ bra tA/ pa tri'i skabs 'dir gzhan tshog thams cad snga ma d+hA tri'i skabs dang 'dra la/ dang po'i on gnyis pa'i o'i bar rnams la u ba d+hA ring por mi
62b7(mdo 'grel): chab/ spyi leg/ spyi sra ba 'gyur te/ d+hA tri zhes ba rkyen dro tsa mdza' can yin la/ bri tri zhes pa tri tsa mdza' can ma yin pas se/ /paM ta ro/ pi ta ra(mdo 'grel): lta bu'o/ /gzhan rnams rigs 'gre'o/ /dzA mag ba mA tri/ b+hA sun zla tri sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /nri ca/ ni'i
63a1(mdo 'grel): yang na'o/ /nri zhes ba'i rtags la rnam dbye drug pa'i A ma ma gto glas pa'i tri'i skabs dang 'dra/ A ma la rtags mdza' ring por 'gyur ba dang mi 'gyur ba 'ang ma ka can du bya ste/ nri'a NAM 'am/ yang na nri NAM lta bu'o/ /da rnams kyis skyos
63a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i rtags la ri yig mdza' ca min gyi bya ba rnams bshad zin to/ /skabs 'dir ?ta dang lita dang e ta rnams kyi mdza' can gyi rtags med par grags so/ /~ aau yig mdza' las go'i sgra la dper brjod du ba ste/ ga ta Ni ta/ go las na ta'o/ /o
63a3(mdo 'grel): mdza' can go lta bu'i pa rol gyi rnam dbye dang bo nas gnyis pa'i aau Ta'i bar sngar thams cad gnas pa'i ming can zhes brda chang byas pa de rnams la skabs 'dir na 'gro ba'i ming can zhes ming/ 'dogs byed do/ /gal/ su aau dzas rnams
63a4(mdo 'grel): nya Na 'gro ba la a tsA 'o zhes pa'i mngos rtags mdza' 'phel ba/ gau(mdo 'grel): gA wau/ gA wa(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa'i a ma dang shas la/ o to nya mSha so/ /o ta las a ma shas dag la'o/ /rtags o yig mdza' can las rnam dbye gnyis ba'i a ma
63a5(mdo 'grel): shes pa rol la rtags mdza' i o dang pha rol gyi a 'dus pas A ru 'gyur te/ yam la/ gAM/ aau la/ gA wau/ shas la/ gA(mdo 'grel): gsum pa rnams la/ ga wa/ go b+hyaM/ go b+hi(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa rnams la/ ga wa/ go b+hyaM/ go b+hya(mdo 'grel): lnga pa rnams la/ go:
63a6(mdo 'grel): go b+hyaM/ go b+hya(mdo 'grel): drug ba rnams la/ go(mdo 'grel): ga wO(mdo 'grel): ga wAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ ga wi/ ga wo(mdo 'grel): gShu/ bod tshig/ kho gau(mdo 'grel): he gA wau/ he gA wa(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du/ su dya sogs kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /de ltar o mdza' can rnams bshad zin to/ /
63a7(mdo 'grel): da ni ye yig mdza' can las re'i gser ra ma bsgral dang re brjod na/ ri la su/ rA yo ha li/ re'i hal la'o/ /e yig mdza' can de sgra lta bu'i pha rol tu rnam da nyi ma bye hal thog ma can gang byung yang/ rtags mdza' i e de A ru 'gyur ro/ /
63b1(mdo 'grel): rA(mdo 'grel): rA yau/ rA ya(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa rnams la/ rA yaM/ ra yau/ rA yA(mdo 'grel): gsum ba rnams la/ rA yA/ rA b+hAM/ rA b+hi(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa rnams la/ nA ye/ rA b+hyaM rA b+hi(mdo 'grel): lnga ba rnams la/ rA ya(mdo 'grel): rA b+hyaM/ rA b+hya(mdo 'grel): drug pa rnams la/ rA ya/ rA yo(mdo 'grel): rla yAM/ bdun pa rnams la/ rA yi/ rA yo(mdo 'grel): rA su
63b2(mdo 'grel): bod tshig la/ he rA(mdo 'grel): he rA lo/ he rA ya(mdo 'grel): aau yig mdza' can glo zhes pa'i sgra? la dper brjod bya ste/ /a ce thog ma can rnams la aau A war 'gyur/ ha la thog ma can rnams la bya ba lhag po med pas/ rnam dbye dang bo rnams la/ glau(mdo 'grel): glA wau/
63b3(mdo 'grel): grA wa(mdo 'grel): gnyis ba la/ glA waM/ glA ?/ glA wa(mdo 'grel): gsum ba la/ glA wA/ glau d+ha na blo b+ho ?? glas so/ /nau la sogs pa rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /i ti pA ni byi ka ra na sya sU trA da dza n+ta pu rli d+hA sa ma bA dA(mdo 'grel): zhes pa pA Ni ni byi ka ra Na'i mdo las a tsa'i mdza' can skyes
63b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i rtags rnams rdzogs so/ /de rnams kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan cos chen po pA ni ni bya ka ra na gzung 'grel gyi gdon chog dper brjod sogs zin bris su bkod ba legs bshad nor bu 'dren pa'i shing rta'i zhes bya ba las skyes pa'i rtags a ca?
63b5(mdo 'grel): mdza' can rnams kyi chog sbyir btang dmigs gsal dang bcas pa dags ba rnams re zhig rjogs so// (mdo 'grel): //da ni bud kyi rtags las a tsa ma drA na na gyi chog rnams bshad par bya ste/ na mA la/ su/ ha la drI pa A ba ring po so
63b6(mdo 'grel): kyis su pyis/ ra mA/ ra mA la/ aau/ aau da A pa(mdo 'grel): aau'i A pa las so/ /bud med kyi rtags A pa kyi mdza' can rnam dbye dang po'i gnyis tshig aau dang/ gnyis pa'i gnyos tshog aau gnyis ni sh+ri ru 'gyur te/ sha rtse ba ma 'bro ba'i ming can yin pas
63b7(mdo 'grel): phyis mtshoms sbyar bas/ /ra me/ ra mA las dzas dang po dag la zhes pas/ ra mA(mdo 'grel): ra mA la/ kun tu bod pa'i su/ sAM bud dto tsa/ saM bud d+hi la yang ngo/ /a pa mdza' can ni saM bud d+hi pha rol la er 'gyur te tags mdza' i/ thung ngu
964a1(mdo 'grel): ed sogs kyis saM bud d+hi phyis bas/ ha ra mi/ gnyis tshig dang yang tshig gong dang 'dra ste he ra me/ he ra mA(mdo 'grel): ra mA la/ aM/ yam la snga ma 'os/ ra mAM/ a la/ ra mi/ shas la dang bo dag gi zhes pas ra mA(mdo 'grel): ra mA la
964a2(mdo 'grel): gsum pa'i TA/ AM ti tsa pA(mdo 'grel): A ba kyi A nga la 'ang ngo/ /rtags A ba mdza' can ni A nga ste rnam dbye gsum pa'i TA dang yang gi sgras drug pa dang bdur ba'i os rnams pha rol la rtags mdza' e ru 'gyur te/ rnams mdza' o mtshams
964a3(mdo 'grel): spyar/ ra ma A/ phya b+has la/ ra mA b+hyaM(mdo 'grel): ra mA b+hi(mdo 'grel): ra mA la/ de /yA TA pa(mdo 'grel): A ba las yA TO/ rtogs A ba kyi mdza' las pha rol tu nga 'gro ba'i ming can gyi rnam dbye rnams byung na yA Ta A ga ma 'jug go/ /ra mA yA/ e/ A Ta shTa/ ATa
964a4(mdo 'grel): las 'ang ngo/ /yA Ta lta bu A a thA can gyi A ga ma byung ba de pha rol a tsa thog ya can dang phrad na 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ra mA yai/ b+hyAM b+hya(mdo 'grel): la/ ra mA b+hyaM/ ra mA b+hya(mdo 'grel): lnga pil ngas/ yA ra byin gong ltar bsgrubs pas/ ra nA yA(mdo 'grel): ra mA mhyaM/
964a5(mdo 'grel): ra mA b+hya(mdo 'grel): A Ta lta bu yA mdza' can gyi A ga ma byung ba de pha rol a tsa thog ma can dang phrad na 'phel bar 'gyur te/ ra mA yai/ b+hyaM b+hya(mdo 'grel): la/ ra mA b+hyaM/ ra mA b+hya(mdo 'grel): lnga pa ling sai/ yATa byin gong ltar bsgrubs pas/ ra mA yA(mdo 'grel): ramA b+hyaM/
964a6(mdo 'grel): ma rtags sarbA'i sgra la/ rnam dbye dang bo rnams dang/ bod tshig rnams dang/ gnyis ba rnams bshad ma thag par mA dang 'dras rbA(mdo 'grel): sa ges rbA(mdo 'grel): te sa rbe/ he sa rbe/ he sa rbA(mdo 'grel): sarbAM sa rbe/ gsum pa bzod dka' ma/ na gar ko Ta'i lha mo/ yang 'dra bas/ sarbA yA/
964a7(mdo 'grel): sarbA b+hyAM/ sarbA b+hi/ sarbA la/ de/ sarbA mna(mdo 'grel): syA DDA swa shtsa/ sarba nA ma las syA Ta ste thung ngu 'ang ngo/ /sarbA'i ming can A ba mdza' rnams las pha ro ba tu ram dbyed 'gro ba rnams byung na snyA Ta A ga ma 'jug cing rtags mdza' thung ngur 'gyur ro/ /
64b1(mdo 'grel): sarba syEe/ b+hyaM b+hya sa la/ sarbA b+hyaMsa rbA b+hya(mdo 'grel): dsil/ sarba syA(mdo 'grel): sarbA b+hya(mdo 'grel): drug pa la/ sarba syA(mdo 'grel): yo(mdo 'grel): sarbA sAM/ bdun ba la/ sarba syaM/ sarba yo(mdo 'grel): sadbA su/ de bzhin du/ bi shwA la sogs pa rnams kyang rigs 'gre'o/ /u t+ta ra pU rbA zhes ba la rnam dbye da 'gro ba
64b2(mdo 'grel): rnams ma gtogs sarbA dang 'dri/ nga 'gro ba rnams la ra mA'i skabs dang sarbA skang gnyis ker gyi bya ba 'jug bas 'dam ka can no/ /u t+ta ra bU rbA/ u t+ta ra pU rbe u t+ta sna tshogs ma ra pU rbA(mdo 'grel): he u t+ta ra pU rbe/ he u t+ta ra pua rbe/ he u t+ta ra pU rba(mdo 'grel): gnyis ba rnams
64b3(mdo 'grel): la/ u t+ta ra pU rbAM/ u t+ta ra bU rbe/ u t+ta ra pU rbA(mdo 'grel): gsum pa rnams la/ u t+ta blu rba yA/ u t+ta ra bU rbA b+hyaM/ a t+ta ra pU rbA b+haM(mdo 'grel): u t+ta ra pU rbA la/ de/ bi b+hA ShA di ta sa mA se ba hu bri'a hau/ 'bru mang bo'i tshig sdud la phyogs la 'dim ka'o/ /phyogs kyi sgra 'bru mang po'i
64b4(mdo 'grel): tshig sdud byas pa A mdza' can rnam dbyed 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la sa rgA skabs ltar syaT A ga ma byin/ rtags mdza' thung dur byed pa dang/ ra ma'i skabs ltar yATa ster ba 'dam ka can no/ /u t+ta ra pU rba sye/ u t+ta ra pU rbA yi/ u t+ta ra pU rba b+hyaM/ u t+ta ra
64b5(mdo 'grel): pnyU rba b+hya(mdo 'grel): sags so/ /bi b+hA ShA dwi tI A tri tI yA b+hyaM/ dwi ti'a yA tri tI yA dag las 'dam ka'o/ /dwa tI yA dang tra tnya yA gnyis la'ang rnam dbye da 'gro ba rnams la yA Ta 'dam ka can te/ dper na/ bzhi ba'i de la/ dwi tI yA ye/ dwi tI ya sya/ twi tA yA yai/ dri ??
64b6(mdo 'grel): ya sya/ lta bu'o/ /a mA zhes ba yang sa bud d+hi ma gtogs rnams dbye thams cad ra mA'i skabs dang 'dra/ sa bu d+d+hi la cung mi 'dra ste/ a mpA la/ saM bud d+hi/ a m+ba rtha na byo(mdo 'grel): h+ra sba(mdo 'grel): a m+bA'i don na dI rnams kyi zung ngu'o/ /a mpA'i sgra dang na di'a'i ming can rnams
64b7(mdo 'grel): saM bud d+hi pha rol la rtags mdza' thung dur 'gur te/ he a ma a k+kA kor rgyun ma dang/ a l+la? dsigs byed lha mo/ yang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /'grel bar/ a m+bi'a'i don can yin kyang de phan gyi rkyen Da dang/ la dang/ ka gnas pa de la mo rtags su bsgrub pa'i rkyen
65a1(mdo 'grel): TA ba byin ba lta bu la saM bud d+hi la yang thung ngur mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes bshad pas/ dper na/ a m+bA DA la/ saM bud d+hi byin thung dur mi 'gyur/ ra mA dang 'dra bas/ he a nbA De/ de bzhin du/ he a m+bA le/ he a mibA ke/ lta bu'o/ /
65a2(mdo 'grel): dza rA zhes pa'i sgra la rnam dbye hal thog ma can rnams la ra ma'a'i skabs dang 'dra/ a tsa thog ma can rnams la dza rA nyid dza ras zhes bar 'gyur ba dang rA ma'i skabs gnyis 'dam ka can du bya ste/ rnam dbye dang po rnams la/ dza rA/ dza ra sau/
65a3(mdo 'grel): rgan mo/ dzar sa(mdo 'grel): bod tshig la/ he dza re/ he dza ra sau/ he dza ra sa(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa la/ dza ra saM/ dza ra sau/ dza ra sa(mdo 'grel): gsum pa la/ dza ra sA(mdo 'grel): dza rA b+hyaM/ dza rA b+hi(mdo 'grel): bzhi ba la/ dzar se/ dza rA b+hyaM/ dza rA b+hya(mdo 'grel): lnga pa la/ dza ra sa(mdo 'grel): dza rA b+hyaM/ dza rA b+hyaM(mdo 'grel): drug ba la/ dza rA
65a4(mdo 'grel): sa(mdo 'grel): dza ra so(mdo 'grel): dza ra sAM/ bdun ba la/ dza ra si/ dza ra so(mdo 'grel): dza ra su/ 'di rnams dza ras su 'gyur ba'i phyogs yin la/ ra mA dang 'dra ba'i skabs kyi dper brjod go ba de bas ma bkod do/ /nA si kA zhes ba rnam dbye dang bo rnams dang/ kun tu bod
65a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i don can rnams dang/ rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig dang gnyis tshig rnams ra mA'i skabs dang 'dra/ shas nas brtsams te/ shas la sogs ba rnams la bad da ta nas zhes ba'i mdos/ nA si kA nas zhes par 'gyur bas/ shas
65a6(mdo 'grel): la/ na sa(mdo 'grel): gsum pa rnams la/ na sA/ no b+hyaMA/ no b+hi(mdo 'grel): bzhi ba la/ na se/ no b+hyaMA/ bo b+hya(mdo 'grel): lnga pa la/ nas(mdo 'grel): no b+hyaMA/ no b+hya(mdo 'grel): drug ba la/ na sa (mdo 'grel): na so(mdo 'grel): na samA/ bdun pa la/ na si/ na so(mdo 'grel): na sU /ni sha'a/ zhes ba'ang su nas shas kyi par ra
65a7(mdo 'grel): mA dang 'dra/ shas nas bzung ste/ shas la sogs ba rnams zhes ba'i mdos/ 'di shA/ shi sha ru 'gyur/ shas la/ ni sha(mdo 'grel): TA la/ ni shA/ ni sha la/ b+hyaMA/ bra shtsa b+h+ra sdza sri dza pi dza rA dza b+hA ja tsha shAM Sha
65b1(mdo 'grel): bra shA b+h+ra snga sri dza mri dza ya dza rla dza b+h+ra ja tsha sha rnams kyi Sha'o/ /bra shtsa sogs bdun nang/ tsha dang sha srog med ming mdza' yin ba de dza la so sor bsu ba'i yi ge gang mthong yang kha ru 'gyur ro/ /dzha sha la dzha la rnams kyi dza sha rnams
65b2(mdo 'grel): zhes bas Sha Da drangs/ ni Db+hyaM/ ni DbTi(mdo 'grel): bzhi ba la/ ni she/ ni Db+hyaM/ ni Db+hya(mdo 'grel): ni Db+hya(mdo 'grel): lnga pa la/ ni sha ni Db+hya/ ni Db+hya(mdo 'grel): drug ba la/ ni sha(mdo 'grel): ni sho(mdo 'grel): ni'a shAM/ bdun pa'i di dang os la/ ni shi/ ni sho(mdo 'grel): ni she/ su/ sha Sha/ Sha ?? Da las sa la d+hu Ta'o/ /zhes pas/ d+huT A ga ma khang
65b3(mdo 'grel): la tsar 'o zhes bas/ d+ha te/ Da Ta/ ni TTa/ mAM sa bri ta nA rnams kyang rnam dbye thams cad gi nas ba'i ming can rnams la ra mA dang 'dra/ shas nas bzung 'dam ga can te/ 'grel par mI sa bri ta nA sA nu rnams kyi mAMn sa pri ta snu rnams su yang na'o zhes ba byung bras
65b4(mdo 'grel): rnam dbye shas sogs pa rol la/ ma'aM sa/ ni/ mAM sa bri ta nA/ ni/ pri ta/ sA nu ni/ snu rnams su yang na 'gyur ro/ /sha sa la/ mAM sa(mdo 'grel): tA la/ mAM sA/ b+hyaM b+hyi sa gnyis la/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i mdza' dbyi'o zhes bas sa phyis/ mAM/ b+hyaMA/ mAM b+hi(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /de bzhin du
65b5(mdo 'grel): bri ta(mdo 'grel): bri tA/ braM b+hyaM/ bri db+hi(mdo 'grel): sogs so/ /snu ni 'chad 'gyur d+he nu dang 'bra'o/ /bi? shwa pA dang/ go bA sogs ra mA dang 'dra'o/ /de/ rnams kyis bung med du ba rjod ba a rang mdza' can gyi bya ba rnams bstan zin to// (mdo 'grel): da ni mo rtags i 'thung mdza' can gyi bya ba rnams
65b6(mdo 'grel): par bya ste/ ma ti ba su/ ma ti(mdo 'grel): ma gi la/ aau/ dang po dag gi zhes pas/ rna tshogs 'thung ma/ ba lang skyong ma/ mi tA/ ma ti dza sa/ dza sa la 'ang ngos/ ma ta la(mdo 'grel): ma ti/ a ma/ aM la snga ma zhes pas/ ma ting/ aau la/ a tI/ ma ti/ shas dang po dag gi mngos/ /
65b7(mdo 'grel): ma ti'a(mdo 'grel): ti/ blo gos/ TA/ 'dir bud med kyi rtags yin pas cA nar mi 'byur/ ma hya'a/ ma ti b+hyaM/ ma ti b+hi(mdo 'grel): ma ti la/ de/ ri ti h+ra swa shtsa/ da 'gro ba la thung ngu'i yang na'o/ /bud med du brjod pa'i yi u thung du rnams dang/ ?? ya u wa thong ba'i
66a1(mdo 'grel): ring sU ring rnams kyang rnam dbye ba 'phro ba rnams pha rol la na dI ming can gyi cho ga rnams yin par bya ste/ A rdna? dya rtsan dI las A TO/ /bud med kyi rtags na dI'i ming can las rnam dbye da 'gro ba rnams la A Ta A ga ma ste ro/ /ma g+hi? la/
66a2(mdo 'grel): yang na bar byas pa/ ma tye/ ma ta ye/ ma ti b+hyaM/ ma ti bya(mdo 'grel): snga pa'i nga si la 'dam ka/ ma tyA(mdo 'grel): ma te(mdo 'grel): ma ti b+hyAM/ ma ti b+hya(mdo 'grel): drug pa ba'ang nyam tyA (mdo 'grel): ma te(mdo 'grel): ma tyo(mdo 'grel): ma tI nAM/ ri la/ mi dyAM/ ma tau/ ma tyo(mdo 'grel): ma ti Shu/ bod tshig/ he ma te/ he ma tI/ he ma ti ya/
66a3(mdo 'grel): sh+ru ti/ smri ti/ bud d+hi rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /tri la jes/ tri tsa Na ro(mdo 'grel): stri yaM ti sri tsa te sri/ tri tsa cung dag gi bud med la ti sri tsa te sri dge go/ gsum gyi skad dong tri dang/ bzhi'i skad dod tsa tung gnyis ni mo rtags kyi skabs rnams dbye pha rol la tri ni/
66a4(mdo 'grel): thong pa/ dran pa/ klo/ tri sri dang/ tsa tu ra ni/ tsa ta pri zhes par 'gyur ro/ /ti sri/ dzas/ tsa ta swaM/ dzas/ a tsi ra ri ta/ (mdo 'grel): ri ta kyi bas? tsa pla ra'o/ /ti sri tsa ta sri shes ri ta mthar 'gyur ba'i ri ta de rnams dbye a ca thog ma can rnam la ra srog med du 'gyur ro/ /
66a5(mdo 'grel): ti sa(mdo 'grel): tsa ta sra(mdo 'grel): shas la ti(mdo 'grel): tsa tra phra(mdo 'grel): ti sri b+hi(mdo 'grel): tsa ta sri b+hi(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa lnga ba gnyis la/ ti sri b+hya(mdo 'grel): tsa ta sri b+hya(mdo 'grel): drug pa'i A ma la/ ba a tsa/ zhes pa'i 'dos/ nuT na ti sri tsa ta sri/ ti sri tsa ta sri dag la ma yin no/ /sbyir btang nAM la rtags mdza' ring po thob kyang/
66a6(mdo 'grel): dmigs gsal ti sri dang/ co ta sri dag nAM pha rol la ring por 'gyur ba ma yin te/ ti sri NAM/ tsa ta sri NAM/ bdun pa la/ ti sri Shu/ bod tshig la/ he ti sra(mdo 'grel): he tsa tasra(mdo 'grel): braM ya tri zhes pa lta bu ming thog ma can la tri/ ti sri zhes
66a7(mdo 'grel): bar mi 'gyur la/ rnam dbye yang mang tshig cum zad thams cad 'jug ste/ cho ga yang skyes pa'i rnyags ha ri'i skabs su bshad pa dang 'dra la/ Twa dang shas nar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du/ dga' ba gsum/ pri ya dga' ba bzhi/ tsa/ tur zhes pa yang/
66b1(mdo 'grel): tsa ta srir mi 'gyur te/ dper brjod rgyas pa log tu 'byung ngo/ /yang skabs 'gar ming dang po tsan la yang/ ti sraM/ tsya ta sraM/ zhes par 'gyur ba'ang srid do/ /zhes 'grel par bshad do/ /dI'i sgra la/ tad sogs kyi rnam dbye/ la A/ a la bud med du brjod pa'i
66b2(mdo 'grel): TA pha sbyar bas dwA zhes grub/ de la rnam dbye rnams kyi gnyis tshig rnams byin/ ra mA tar bsgrubs pas/ aau gnyis la/ dwe/ b+hyAM gsum la/ dA b+hyAM/ yos gnyis la/ dwa yo(mdo 'grel): de yan gyis bud med kyi rtags i thung mdza' can rnams kyi bya ba bshad
66b3(mdo 'grel): zin to/ / ` da ni mo rtags a'i ring gi cho ga rnams ston par bya ste/ gau rI la/ su/ hala dI zhes pas su phyis/ gau rI/ aau dang/ jes la/ gau rylau glo yU stya khyo na dI/ a'i a'u du da med brjod pa dag na pI'o/ /a'i ring dang a'u ring bud med du brjod pa rnams na dI'i
66b4(mdo 'grel): 'di can zhes bya'o/ /gau rI la/ suM bud+d+hi su/ am+bA'i don na dI rnams kyi thung du'o zhes byas rtags mdza' thung dur 'gyur/ zeng thung du/ zhes pas saM bud d+hi phyis/ he tau ri/ he gau rylo/ /he gau ryla(mdo 'grel): gau ri la/ am/ aM la sngon ma 'os/ gau rAM/ aau la/
66b5(mdo 'grel): gau sgau? shal la/ dang gang mo po dag gi zhes pas/ gau rI(mdo 'grel): gsum pa rnams la/ gauryA/ gau rA b+hyaM/ gau rI b+hi rtsa bzhi ba'i de la/ na dI las A Ta'o zhes pas/ A Ta A ga ma/ gauryue/ b+hyazm b+hyas la/ gau rI b+hyaM/ go rI b+hya(mdo 'grel): nga si la/ go ryma(mdo 'grel): b+hyAM bya(mdo 'grel): la/ gau rI b+hyaM/
66b6(mdo 'grel): bau sle b+hya(mdo 'grel): ngas la yang/ gau rma(mdo 'grel): os la/ go rlo(mdo 'grel): AM pa/ thung du na dI zhes pas/ nuT/ gau rI'i NAM/ de pa/ gau ryAM/ os la/ gau ryo(mdo 'grel): su pa la/ go rI Shu/ bA nI/ na dI la sogs med po zhig 'di dang 'dra'o/ /labri? zhes/ rI ba kyi rjes pa yin pas/
66b7(mdo 'grel): /su mi dbyi ste/ le k+Shtri?(mdo 'grel): gzhan ma rnams gau rI dang 'dra'o//tA rI sgrola ma/ dang/ ta n+t+ri yang/ laSh+mI dang 'dra'o/ /sti jud med/ zhes pa'i sgra la su/ su byas/ rgyun can te cu'o/ /stri/ aau/ strI yA(mdo 'grel): stI'i 'o/ /dpel mo/ rnam dbye a tsa dang po can rnams
67a1(mdo 'grel): la stI zhes pa'i rtags kyi a'i ni yi yar 'gyur te/ stri yau/ dzas la/ sti yA(mdo 'grel): bod tshig la/ he stwa/ he stri yau/ he stra ya(mdo 'grel): stri ya yam/ bA mA so(mdo 'grel): yam shag dag la yang na'o/ /rnam dbye gnyis pa'i gcig tshig aM dang mang tshig
67a2(mdo 'grel): shaMs dag pha rol la stri'i yi yar yang na 'gyur te/ stri yam/ yang na a ma la snga ma 'os/ stri/ aau la/ stri yau/ shas/ bshad ma thag pa'i mdos/ stri ya(mdo 'grel): yang na dang bo dag gi zhes pas stri(mdo 'grel): gsum pa la/ stri yA/ stI b+hyaM/ stri b+hi(mdo 'grel): de la/
67a3(mdo 'grel): AT dang/ i ya/ stri yi/ stri b+hyuM/ stri b+hy(mdo 'grel): lnga pa la/ stri yA(mdo 'grel): stI b+hyaM(mdo 'grel): drug pa la/ stri yA(mdo 'grel): stri yo(mdo 'grel): sti NAM/ bdun pa la/ stri yAM/ sti yo(mdo 'grel): stri Shu/ sh+rI/ la su sh+rI(mdo 'grel): sh+rI la/ aau dang dzaMs/ ya tso la sh+nu byangs b+h+ruM rnams kyi
67a4(mdo 'grel): zhes pa'i dmos i ya/ sh+ri yo/ sh+ri yi(mdo 'grel): sh+rI la saM bud d+hi byin/ sh+rI/ su ne yaM du war s+thA nA wi stri/ stwi ma yin pa'i i ya u wa gnas pa dag ma yin no/ /dpal mo/ /sti me yin bzhes sti'i sgra ni i ya u war 'gyur yang na
67a5(mdo 'grel): dI'i ming can yin la/ stwi ma yin a i ya u wa gnas ba ste/ a'i iyar 'gyur ba dang a'u uM war 'gyur ba rnams bud med du brjod pa'i skubs 'dir yang na ni dI'i ming can ma yin te/ skabs 'dir sh+rI yang/ n+na di'i ming
67a6(mdo 'grel): can ma yi ro pas saM bu da d+hi dbyi ba dang rtags thung ngu ra 'gyur ba sogs mi byed/ he sh+ri(mdo 'grel): he sh+ri yau/ he sh+ri ya(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa rnams la/ sh+ri yaM/ sh+ri yau/ shi ya(mdo 'grel): gsum pa la/ sh+ri yA/ sh+rI b+hyaM/ sh+rI b+hi(mdo 'grel): sh+rI la/ de/ sbyir
67a7(mdo 'grel): btang i ya/ ku wA thob pa rnams bud med du brjod pa'i skabs na dI'i ming canma yin no zhes bkag kyang dmigs bsal/ nga 'gro ba la thung ngu'i yang na'o zhes pa'i 'grel par/ a'i a'u dag kyang yang na bar bshad pas/
67b1(mdo 'grel): rnam dbyed 'gro ba'i ming can rnams lan dI'i ming can gyi bya ba ltar AT ster ba dang i ya u thar 'gyur ba gnyis ka thob pas/ sh+ri ye/ sh+ri yai/ b+haM b+hya(mdo 'grel): la/ sh+Ni b+hyaM shI d+hya lnga bI ra si la/ sh+ri ya(mdo 'grel): sh+ri yA(mdo 'grel): b+hyaM b+hya(mdo 'grel): la/ shI b+hyAM/ sh+rI b+hya(mdo 'grel): drug pa'i ngas la/ sh+ri(mdo 'grel): ya/ sh+ri yA(mdo 'grel): os la
67b2(mdo 'grel): sh+ri yo(mdo 'grel): sh+rila/ a'um/ bA mi/ Ama/ la yang na'o/ /il u wa thob pa rtsams rnam dbye drug ba'i AM pha rol la na dI'i ming can yang na'o/ /sh+ri yaM/ na dI'i mid can ltar na/ thung du ni dA'i zhes pas/ nuT/ sh+rI NI/ bdun pa'i di la/ sh+ri yAM/ sh+ri yi/ os dang sub la/ sh+ri
67b3(mdo 'grel): yo(mdo 'grel): sh+rI Shu/ su d+hA la sogs pa yang 'di dang 'da' o/ /pra d+hI zhes pa sgra mo rtags la yang cho ga thams cad skyes pa'i skabs su bshad par dang khyad par med do/ /de rnams kyis bud med kyi rtags las a'i ring mdza' can gyi bya ba rnams bstan zin to/ /~ da ni mo rtogs
67b4(mdo 'grel): u thung mdza' can blo sangs rnams brjod par bya ste/ d+he blo rab ma/ nu la/ su d+he nu(mdo 'grel): aau la/ dang po dgig zhes pas/ d+henU/ d+he nu/ jes/ dzas Ang ngos/ d+he na ba(mdo 'grel): gnyis pa rnams la/ d+he nu/ am/ am la snga ma zhes pas/ d+ha nuM/ d+he nu/ aau/ d+he na/
67b5(mdo 'grel): d+he nu/ shas/ dang po dag gis mdos/ b+he nu (mdo 'grel): gsum 'dzag pa rnams la/ d+he nu TA/ TA nA ra mi 'gyur/ d+hA nA/ d+he nu b+hyaM/ d+he nu b+hi(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa la/ d+he nu/ dor 'gro bala thung du'i yang na 'os/ d+he nai/ d+he na we/ d+he nu b+hyaM/ d+he nu b+hya(mdo 'grel): lnga pa'i ngas la/
67b6(mdo 'grel): d+hE dgA(mdo 'grel): d+he no(mdo 'grel): b+hye b+hyas 'dra/ drug pa'i ngas la/ d+he nwA(mdo 'grel): d+he no(mdo 'grel): yos la/ dte nO(mdo 'grel): AM la/ d+he n+nu nAM/ bdun pa'i de la/ d+he nrAM/ d+ha na/ os la/ d+he nre(mdo 'grel): d+he nu Shu/ bod mchig rnams la/ he d+he no/ /he d+he nU/ he d+he na wa rnams grub ste a tsa mig
67b7(mdo 'grel): gcig pa'i 'gyur khyar phran tsam ma gtogs gong du bshad pa ma ti'i skabs dang 'dra'o/ /ta mu phus phra ma la sogs pa yang 'di da de 'dra'o/ /u thung mthar can kroShtu la bshad ma thag pa dang bya mi 'dra ste/ stri yI ce/ bud med la'ang ngo/ /
68a1(mdo 'grel): kroSh+dzu'i sgra ni bud med kyi rtags la tri tsa bzhin ri mthar 'gyur bas/ kro Sh+Tri 'gyur/ ri n+ni b+hyo dI ba/ ri ta/ na rnams las dI pa'o/ /rtags ri ta mdza' can rne mis la bud mid du bsgrub pa'i rkyen dI ba 'gyur te/ dI ba byin/
68a2(mdo 'grel): kro ShwI zhes par 'gyur ro/ /ca byang mo/ cho ga thams cad sngar mo rtags a'i ring skabs su bshad pa'i gau rI dang 'bra'o/ /de rnams kyis u thung mdza' can mo rtags kyi chog bstan zin to/ / ` da ni me rtags a'u ra di mdza' can
68a3(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi bya ba brjod par bya ste/ ba b+hU/ su ba d+hU(mdo 'grel): ba d+hU(mdo 'grel): aau dang/ dzas/ ba d+hwau/ ba d+hU/ aau la/ ba d+hwau/ shas la/ dad bo dag gi mdos/ /ba d+hU(mdo 'grel): gsum ba rnams la/ ba d+hwa:/ ba d+hU b+hya ma/ ba d+hA b+hi(mdo 'grel): de la/ ba d+hwai/ ba d+hU b+hywi
68a4(mdo 'grel): phyis he ba d+hu/ he ba d+hwau/ he ba d+h+ra(mdo 'grel): ba mnang ma/ d+hu la/ a ma/ aM la sngon ma'i 'os/ ba d+hU/ aau la/ ba d+hwau/ shas la/ dad po dag gi na dos/ ba d+hU(mdo 'grel): gsum ba rnams la/ ba d+hwa:/ ba d+hU b+hya ma/ ba d+hU b+hi(mdo 'grel): de la/ ba d+hai ba d+hU b+hyAM
68a5(mdo 'grel): /ba d+hU b+hya(mdo 'grel): nga si la/ ba b+h+ra(mdo 'grel): b+hyaM b+hyas 'dra/ 'das la yang/ ba d+hwa(mdo 'grel): os la/ ba b+hwo(mdo 'grel): A ma la/ thung du na bI zhes pas nuT ba b+hA nAM/ di la/ ba d+hwAM/ os la/ ba d+hwo(mdo 'grel): su ba lar/ ba d+hU Shu rnams
68a6(mdo 'grel): grub sta gau rA'i skabs dang 'dri'o/ /de bzhin du/ tsa mu la sogs pa rnams kyang 'di dang 'dra'o/ /b+hU zhes pa'i sgra 'di bya ba thams cad sh+rI 'aM ska bas dang 'dra/ saM bud d+hi la thung ngur byed pa dang mi byed pa 'dam
68a7(mdo 'grel): ma yin pas/ he b+h+ru/ he b+h+rA(mdo 'grel): pu la rb+ha slar yad 'byung ma/ g.yo ma/ zhes pa gzhan cho ga thams cad ba d+hU gal bar brjod ma/ dang 'dra/ drug pa'i a'u ma la/ e kA ju t+ta ra ba de Na(mdo 'grel): rjes ma'i tshig a tsa gcig pa la
68b1(mdo 'grel): Na'o/ /rnam dbye tshig sdung kyis bsdus pa'i ming snga ma 'a 'am ra lta bu na Nar 'gyur ba'i rgyu mtshan can yod na de'i rjes ma'i tshi ga a tsa gcig pa ste dbyangs gcig las ming ba de bar ni yo kyang na Nar gyur ro/ /pu na rbU NAM lta bu'o/ /barnA blU la/ su barShA b+hU(mdo 'grel): go
68b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ dzas/ barShA b+hwa shtsa/ barShA b+hUI 'ang ngo/ /barSha bdU zhes ba'i sgra ni rnam dbye dbyangs thog ma can gang mthong yang ya Nar 'gyur ro/ /barShA b+hwau/ barShA b+hwa(mdo 'grel): bod tshig la/ hi barShA/ b+hU(mdo 'grel): he barShA b+ho/ he barShA b+hw(mdo 'grel): rnam lo dus su 'byung la/ dbye
68b3(mdo 'grel): gzhan ranms la'ang a ci thob ma ce na rnams la u we re 'gyur/ nga 'gro ba'i mdi canrnams la AT ste/ hal thog ma can rnams la bya ba lhag ba med do/ /swa yaM b+hU zhes pa la/ de 'gro ba'i ming can rnams la AT ster/ gzhan skyes pa'i rtags
68b4(mdo 'grel): kyi skabs su bshad pa dang khyad par med do/ /de rnams kyis bud med kyirtags a'u ring rnams kyi chog bshad zin to/ /~ da ni dmigs bsal ri ta mtha can ni/ na Sha TaM swa sU di b+hya(mdo 'grel): swa sri sogs Sha Ta rnams las ma yin no/ /spa sri sogs Sha Ta'i

68b6(mdo 'grel): swa sri/ ta swa tsa ta sri/ na drM tri/ ru ha gri/ ya tri/ mAM traM/ bdun pa 'di rnams la Sha tha'i mang can zhes bya'o/ /sra sri la/ su da'i to/ /u sha na sa sogs kyi mdos/ ri a nang/ si bud d+hi ma yin pa zhes bas u ba d+hA ring bo/ /hal

89a1(mdo 'grel): 'dra bas/ sra sA ro/ /swa sA ra(mdo 'grel): swa sA/ raM/ swa sA dau/ shas dang Ta nA ra ma 'gyur twe bud med kyi rtags yin pas so/ /shas la dang po bdag gi zhes pa'i mdos/ sro sh+rAM(mdo 'grel): TA la/ swa srA/ swa
89a2(mdo 'grel): srI b+hyaM/ swa sra b+ha(mdo 'grel): lhag ma rnams kyang d+hA twaMI skabs dang 'dra'o/ /gzhan Tha Ta'i ming can bstanpa thams cad cho ga 'di kho nas rigs 'dre'o/ /de rnams kyi ring mdza' i bya ba rnams bstan zin? to/ ~/ bud med kyi rtags
